name: Tomato Rice
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML) 3 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp chana dal few fenugreek / methi,1 inch cinnamon / dalchini,4 cloves,few curry leaves,few cashew / kaju,1 onion finely chopped1 green chilli slit,1 tsp ginger paste,2 tomato finely chopped,1 tsp turmeric / haldi tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1  tsp coriander powder,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp mint / pudina chopped,2 cup rice cooked,2 tbsp coriander finely chopped
recipe:
1)In a large kadai heat oil and splutter tempering. 
2)Also, saute few cashews until golden brown. 
3)Add onion, green chilli,  ginger paste and saute well. 
4)Now add tomatoes and saute until tomatoes turn soft and mushy. 
5)Additionally add  turmeric,  chilli powder, coriander powder,  salt and mint leaves. Saute and cook for a minute. 
6)Furthermore, add cooked rice and mix gently. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes to absorb all masala. 
7)Finally, serve tomato rice with raita of your choice.

name: Coconut Rice
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML) 3 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard / rai,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp chana dal,few curry leaves,1 dried red chilli,2 green chilli slit,1 inch ginger finely chopped,10 cashew / kaju,2 cup coconut grated,2 cup cooked rice,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)In a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp urad dal, 1 tsp chana dal, few curry leaves, 1 dried red chilli.
2)Also add 2 green chilli, 1-inch ginger. saute slightly.
3)Now add 10 cashews and roast till the cashews turn golden brown. 
4)Add in cup grated coconut and saute for a minute or till raw smell goes away.
5)Further, add 2 cups cooked rice and required amount of salt.
6)Mix gently without breaking the rice. 
7)Now cover and simmer for 2 minutes, or till rice absorbs coconut flavour. 
8)Finally, serve south style coconut rice with kuzhambu or any curry.

name: Tamarind Rice
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML)For masala powder: 1 tsp sesame oil / gingelly oil,1 tsp coriander seeds,2 tsp urad dal,2 tsp chana dal,1 tsp pepper,1 tsp methi / fenugreek seeds,4 dried kashmiri red chilli,1 tbsp sesame / til ,Other ingredients: 2 tbsp sesame oil / gingelly oi,1 tsp mustard / rai,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp chana dal,2 tbsp peanuts roasted,1 dried kashmiri red chilli broken,few curry leaves,pinch of hing / asafoetida 1 cup tamarind extract,1 tsp turmeric / haldi1 tsp jaggery / gud1 tsp salt,3 cup cooked rice
recipe:
1)Firstly, heat 1 tsp gingelly oil and roast spices.
2) Further roast 1 tbsp sesame seeds till it turns golden brown.
3) Blend to fine powder and masala powder is ready. 
4)Now in a large kadai heat 2 -3 tbsp gingelly oil. 
5)Add in 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp urad dal, 1 tsp chana dal and 2 tbsp peanuts.
6)Saute till mustard seeds splutter. Further add 1 red chill, few curry leaves and pinch of hing. 
7)Saute for few seconds. Add 1 cup tamarind juice, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp jaggery and 1 tsp salt. 
8)Mix well and boil the mixture for 10 minutes or till oil separates. 
9)Further add 2-3 tbsp of prepared masala powder. 
10)Continue to cook till the oil separates from sides. now add 3 cup cooked rice and mix gently. 
11)Finally, tamarind rice is ready to serve.

name: Lemon Rice
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML) 3 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds,1 tsp chana dal, pinch of hing / asafoetida,1 tsp urad dal,few curry leaves,1 dried red chilli,3 tbsp peanuts / groundnut roasted,10 whole cashews,1 green chilli finely chopped,1 inch ginger finely chopped,1 tsp turmeric,2 cups cooked rice,salt to taste,half lemon,2 tbsp coriander leaves finely chopped
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat oil and add in 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tsp chana dal, 1 tsp urad dal, pinch of hing, few curry leaves and 1 dried red chilli. 
2)Allow to splutter. Further add 3 tbsp peanuts and 10 whole cashews. 
3)Roast till cashews turn slightly golden. 
4)Now add 1 green chilli, 1 inch ginger and 1 tsp turmeric. 
5)Saute for 30 seconds. 
6)Add in 2 cups cooked rice and salt to taste. (use leftover rice or make sure to cool the rice completely before you add)
7)Mix well making sure rice doesn't break. 
8)Now turn off the stove and add half lemon and 2 tbsp coriander leaves. Mix well. 
9)Finally, serve lemon rice with papad or pickle of your choice.

name: Vegetable Rice
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML)For cooking rice:1 cup basmati rice,1 tsp oil,1 tsp salt,water for soaking & boiling ,For fried rice: 2 tbsp oil,2 clove garlic finely chopped,onion finely chopped,4 tbsp spring onion chopped,carrot finely chopped,2 tbsp cabbage finely chopped,2 tbsp peas / matar,5 beans chopped,capsicum finely chopped,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp soy sauc,1 tbsp vinegar,1 tsp pepper crushed,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and stir-fry 2 clove garlic. 
2)Also, saute 3 onion and 2 tbsp spring onion until they sweat. 
3)Furthermore add vegetables of your choice like carrot, 2 tbsp cabbage,2 tbsp peas, 5 beans, capsicum and 1 tsp salt. 
4)Stir fry on high flame without overcooking vegetables. 
5)Now add 2 tbsp soy sauce and 1 tbsp vinegar. 
6)Stir-fry until the sauce is combined well. 
7)Keeping the flame on high, add cooked rice. 
8)Also, add 1 tsp pepper and 1.5 tsp salt. 
9)Adjust the salt as soy sauce has salt. 
10)Stir-fry by mixing well making sure rice grains won't break. 
11)Further, add 2 tbsp spring onions and mix well. 
12)Finally, enjoy vegetable fried rice with gobi manchurian.

name: Mint Rice
ingredients: For masala paste:handful mint / pudina,handful coriander,3 cloves garlic,1 inch ginger,2 chilli,onion,2 tbsp coconut (grated),1 star anise,2 pod cardamom,5 cloves / lavang,1.5 inch cinnamon,1 tsp pepper,For pulao:2 tbsp ghee / clarified butter,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 bay leaf / tej patta,10 cashew / kaju,1 onion (sliced),1 tomato (chopped),potato / aloo (cubed),capsicum (cubed),carrot (chopped),2 tbsp peas / matar,5 beans (chopped),2 cup water,1 tsp salt,1 cup basmati rice (soaked 20 minutes)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a small blender take handful mint and coriander.
2)Also add 3 cloves garlic, 1 inch ginger, 2 chilli, 2 onion and 2 tbsp coconut.Further, add 1 star anise, 2 pods cardamom, 5 cloves, 1 inch cinnamon and 1 tsp pepper.
3)Blend to smooth paste adding water as required. Keep aside.
4)In a pressure cooker heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute 1 tsp cumin and 1 bay leaf until it turns aromatic.Add 10 cashews and roast until it turns golden brown.
5)Further, add 1 onion and saute well.
6)Also, add 1 tomato and saute until it turns soft and mushy.
7)Now add 2 potato, 3 capsicum, 3 carrot, 2 tbsp peas and 5 beans.Saute for 2 minutes or until it turns aromatic.
8)Add in the prepared masala paste and saute well.Further, add 2 cup water and 1 tsp salt.
9)Also, add 1 cup basmati rice and mix well.Cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles or until rice are cooked well.
10)Finally, pudina pulao / mint rice recipe ready to be served with raita.

name: Brinjal Gravy
ingredients: 6 small sized purple brinjal / baingan / eggplant,3 tbsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds / rai,1 tsp methi / fenugreek seedsfew curry leaves,1 onion (finely chopped),1 cup tamarind water,1 tsp jaggery / gud (optional),2 tbsp coriander leaves (finely chopped),For onion-tomato paste:2 tsp oil,1 onion (thinly sliced),1 tsp ginger garlic paste / adrak lasun paste,1 tsp turmeric powder / haldi,1 to mato (finely chopped),1 tsp coriander powder / daniya powder,1 tsp cumin powder / jeera powder,1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder,1 tsp garam masala powder,salt to taste,for stuffing:2 tbsp sesame seeds / til,1 cup coconut (fresh / desiccated / dry),1 cup peanuts / groundnuts (roasted & peeled),1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder,salt to taste
recipe:
1)Firstly, take the cut brinjal and stuff the prepared stuffing,and fry on medium flame with 3 tbsp of oil,cover and simmer for 2-4 minutes or till they are half cooked
2)Further, take,off and keep aside,now in the same kadai add mustard seeds, methi and curry leaves
3)Allow to splutter,further add onions and saute well,also add prepared onion-tomato paste and continue to saute
4)Furthermore, place the stuffed and fried brinjals,and pour tamarind wate add a piece of jaggery
5)Mix gently, cover and simmer for 5 minutes,stir occasionally and cook till the brinjal gets cooked completely
6)Finally, serve baingan masala with chapathi or roti.

name: Ladyfinger Gravy
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML)For cooking rice:1 cup basmati rice,1 tsp oil1 tsp salt,water for soaking & boiling, For fried rice: 2 tbsp oil,2 clove garlic finely chopped,onion finely chopped,4 tbsp spring onion chopped,carrot finely chopped,2 tbsp cabbage finely chopped,2 tbsp peas / matar,5 beans chopped,capsicum finely chopped,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp soy sauce,1 tbsp vinegar,1 tsp pepper crushed,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)In a large kadai heat oil and saute bhindi. 
2)Saute on medium flame stirring occasionally. 
3)Remove and keep aside. 
4)Now in the same kadai add 2 tsp of oil if required. 
5)Also add jeera and saute till it turns aromatic. 
6)Furthermore, add ginger-garlic paste and saute. 
7)Also add onions and continue to saute. 
8)Add spices like chili powder, turmeric, coriander powder and garam masala. 
9)Saute for a minute on low flame till the spices are cooked well.now add tomato pulp and saute continuously till the oil separates and forms thick masala paste.
10)Now add cashew paste, salt add water as required to adjust the consistency.
11)Get the gravy to boil.
12)Further add saulted bhindi and mix gently.
13)Cover and simmer the gravy for 5 minutes.
14)Now add coriander leaves and mix well.
15)Finally, serve bhindi masala gravy / okra masala curry with plain rice, chapathi or roti.

name: Paneer gravy
ingredients: (1 cup = 255 ML) 3 Ripe red juicy tomatoes,200gm Cashews,200 ml cream,200gm butter,2 tsp chiili powder,kasthuri methi,salt,corainder leaves for garnish,paneer
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai, heat 1 tbsp butter and saute 1 bay leaf, 1 green chilli, 1 tsp kasuri methi till they aromatic.
2)Further saute 1  onion petals and  cubed capsicum,add 1  tsp,turmeric and 1  tsp chilli powder,further add blended tomato-onion paste and mix well.
3)In addition, add prepared kadai masala and 1 tsp salt,cook till the masala paste,starts to release oil,now add 1  to 1 cup water adjusting consistency as required.
4)Add 12 cubes homemade paneer, 2 tbsp cream and mix gently,cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
5)Furthermore, add  tsp garam masala and 2 tbsp coriander leaves.
6)Mix well,finally, serve restaurant-style kadai paneer gravy hot with garlic naan or chapati.

name: Tomato Sabji
ingredients: Tomato - 4 large chopped,Oil - 4 tblsp,Mustard Seeds - 1 tsp,Cumin Seeds - 1 tsp,Curry leaves - 1 sprig,Salt to taste,Sugar - 1 tsp,FOR ROASTING & GRINDING:Coriander Seeds / Malli - 3 tblsp,Fennel Seeds / Sombu / Saunf - 2 tsp,Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 small stick,Dry Red Chilli - 4 to 5,Roasted Gram Dal / Pottu Kadalai - 1 tblsp,Coconut - 3 tblsp
recipe:
1)Take all roasting ingredients in a pan and dry roast till golden. 
2)Take it in a blender and puree till smooth.
3)Now take oil in a pan, add mustard and cumin seeds and let it sizzle.
4)Add in curry leaves and let them sizzle.
5)Add in tomatoes and toss well.
6)Add in salt and sugar and mix well. 
7)Cover and cook for 5 mins.
8)Add in ground masala and water and cook for 10 mins.Serve.

name: Tomato Chutney
ingredients: 2 large ripped tomatoes (chopped),2 cloves garlic,1 tsp urad dal,2 tbsp oil,1 tsp chana dal,1 tsp methi seeds / fenugreek seeds,3 kashmiri dried red chilli,1 tsp turmeric powder / haldi,1 tsp sugar,salt to taste,For tempering:2 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds / rai,1 tsp urad dal,pinch of hing /asafoetida,few curry leaves
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat oil.furthermore add urad dal, chana dal, methi and red chilli. adding few seeds of methi gives a nice taste to chutney.
2)Saute them on medium flame till dal turns golden brown.further, add garlic.
3)Also add chopped tomatoes and continue to saute.
4)Saute till the water evaporates completely and tomato reduces in size.
5)Now add turmeric powder, sugar and salt.
6)Allow the mixture to cool completely and then transfer to a small blender.
7)Further, blend to a smooth paste without adding any water.also prepare the tempering. 
8)Heat oil in a small kadai.
9)Further, once the oil is hot, add mustard seeds, urad dal, hing and curry leaves.allow the tempering to splutter.
10)Later, pour the tempering over tomato chutney.finally, serve with rice, idli or dosa

name: Tomato Biryani
ingredients: 1 tbsp ghee / clarified butter,1 bay leaf / tej patta,5 cloves / lavang,1 inch cinnamon / dalchini,1 star anise,2 pods cardamom / elachi,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp fennel / saunf,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 tsp turmeric / haldi,1 green chilli (slit),1 cup tomato puree,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder,1 tsp biryani masala,1 tsp salt,carrot (cubed),2 tbsp peas / matar,1 tbsp coriander leaves (finely chopped),1 cup coconut milk,2 tbsp mint / pudina (finely chopped),1 cup water,1 cup basmati rice (soaked 20 minutes)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a pressure cooker heat ghee and saute spice.
2)Add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 green chilli. 
3)Saute well.now add 1 cup tomato puree and cook till it releases oil.
4)Further add 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp biryani masala and 1 tsp salt. saute well.additionally, add vegetables of your choice.now add 1 cup coconut milk and 1 cup water. Mix well.
5)Furthermore, add 1 cup basmati rice, soaked 20 minutes and give a good mix.
6)Cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium flame.
7)Finally, serve tomato biryani with onion tomato raita or as it is

name: Tomato Kurma
ingredients: Onion 2,Tomato  2,Sambar powder 1 tsp,Turmeric 1 tsp,Salt  As needed,Coconut,grated cup,Green chillies 5,Fennel 1 tsp,Pottu kadalai/ Fried gram dal 1 tbsp,Oil 1 tbsp,Cinnamon 1 inch piece,Cloves 2
recipe:
1)First grind coconut, fried gram dal,green chillies and fennel with little water to a fine paste.
2)Heat a kadai with oil. 
3)Temper with cinnamon and cloves. 
4)Add finely chopped onion and fry till transparent.
5)Heat a kadai with oil. 
6)Temper with cinnamon and cloves.
7)Add finely chopped tomatoes and little bit of salt. 
8)Fry until it becomes soft, Add sambar powder and turmeric. 
9)Mix well and fry for two more minutes. 
10)Add 1.5 cups of water, add more salt if needed and bring to boil, Add the ground paste and boil for 3-4 minutes. 
11)Adjust water consistency if it is too thick.

name: Tomato Soup
ingredients: 1 tsp butter,onion (finely chopped),2 clove garlic,1 bay leaf / tej patta,3 tomato (chopped),carrot ( chopped),1 tsp salt,1 cup water,1 tsp sugar,1 tsp pepper (crushed),2 tbsp cream / malai
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a kadai heat 1 tsp butter and saute 1  onion, 2 clove garlic and 1 bay leaf.
2)Add 3 tomato, 1  carrot chopped and 1  tsp salt.
3)Saute for a minute or till tomatoes change colour.
4)Add 1  cup water, cover and boil for 10 minutes.
5)Boil till tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
6)Now remove the bay leaf and cool the mixture, blend to smooth paste without adding any water.
7)Now sieve the tomato paste discarding the residue.
8)Add 1 cup water or more adjusting consistency.
9)Get the soup to a boil and add 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp pepper and 1  tsp salt, mix well making sure all the spices are combined well.
10)Turn off the flame and add 2 tbsp cream, mix well.
11)Finally serve creamy tomato soup garnished with mint leaf and cream.

name: Potato Bajji
ingredients: 1 cup Besan/ kadalai mavu heaped,3 tbsp rice flour,1 tsp corn flour corn starch,1 & 1 tsp red chilli powder mild spice,1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp asafoetida,1 tsp cumin seeds,1 pinch cooking soda/ sodium bi carbonate generous,1 tsp ghee,1 tsp black pepper optional ,Oil to deep fry,Salt as needed,1 tbsp Idli dosa batter Optional
recipe:
1)Peel potato, slice thickly and keep immersed in water until use
2)Heat enough oil in a kadai.
3)Take besan, rice flour, corn flour, red chilli powder, turmeric, asafoetida, cumin seeds, cooking soda, pepper and salt in a mixing bowl.
4)Use a whisk to mix well. Add idli dosa batter, enough water to make a thick batter.
5)Spoon in ghee to it and mix again, Add 4-5 potato slices drained from water, patting out excessive water from it.
6)Coat each potato slice in batter and slide gently into hot oil.
7)Pour hot oil over the top of bajjis to puff it nicely.
8)Flip and cook more until both sides are golden and crisp.
9)Drain over paper towel and repeat to finish.

name: Potato Fry
ingredients: 2 Potato large ,2 tsp Sambar powder ,replace with 1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp Turmeric,Salt as needed
recipe:
1)Peel the skin of potato, wash, slice to equal sized rounds.
2)Cut into same thickness strips.
3)Chop the strips to cube, Heat a kadai with oil, splutter mustard, add curry leaves. 
4)Add diced potato and cook for 2 mins. 
5)Stir every 30 sec.
6)Add 2 tsp sambar powder,1.5 tsp turmeric, required salt.
7)Mix and cook same way for 2by4 mins in medium flame, stirring every 30 secs. 
8)Cook for 2 more minutes covered. 
9)Once done, remove in serving bowl.

name: Potato Wedges
ingredients: 4 Potatoes,1 tbsp Garlic finely chopped,1 tbsp Curry leaves finely chopped (Optional),1 tsp Black pepper powder,2 tbsp Oil,Salt as needed
recipe:
1)First cut the potatoes into half. 
2)Divide and cut each half further into two.
3)Hold your knife diagonally to get equal sized wedges.
4)Take the cut wedges in a mixing bowl. 
5)Add rest of the ingredients and mix.
6)Preheat oven at 200 deg C. 
7)Line a baking tray with aluminium foil. 
8)Grease with oil.
9)Spread the potato wedges without layering. 
10)Bake for 30 mins at 200 deg C. 
11)In between, turn the wedges once for even roasting.

name: Potato Chaat
ingredients: 1 Sweet potato large about 220 gms,1 tbsp green chutney,2 tbsp Tamarind chutney,1 lemon,1 tsp red chilli powder,1 tsp cumin seeds powder(bhuna jeera powder),1 tsp chaat masala,1 tsp Kala namak,Salt as needed,2 tbsp coriander leaves,Sev for topping
recipe:
1)Peel and cut the sweet potato into bite sized pieces. 
2)Keep immersed in water to prevent blackening. 
3)Gather other required ingredients.
4)Bring water to boil and add sweet potato to it with required salt. 
5)Cook until soft without mashing.
6)Drain from water, place in a mixing bowl. 
7)Add lemon juice, chilli powder, roasted cumin seeds powder, chaat masala, black salt. Mix well. 
8)Transfer to serving bowl. 
9)Top it with sev and coriander leaves before serving

name: Potato Chips
ingredients: Potato 2,Gram flour 1 cup,Rice flour 2 tbsp,Sesame seeds 2 tsp,Red chilli powder 2 tsp,Turmeric 1 tsp,Asafoetida 1 tsp,Salt as needed,Oil to deep fry
recipe:
1)Peel the skin of potato and keep immersed in water. 
2)Use a grater with large holes and grate the potatoes.
3)Grate the potatoes by starting from one end and finish in other end so that you get longer grated potato, otherwise will fall short.
4)Keep the grated potato immersed in water and wash well. 
5)Drain completely without water in potato.
6)Take grated potato in a mixing bowl. 
7)Add all the other ingredients except oil.
8)Mix well to coat the potatoes, Heat oil in kadai. 
9)Once hot, add the potato mixture in a sprinkled way.
10)Deep fry by stirring occasionally. 
11)Keep the flame in medium once you turn the potato chips.
12)Once golden and crisp, drain over paper towel.

name: Peanut Chutney
ingredients: 1 cup peanut / groundnut,2 tsp oil,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp chana dal,2 cloves garlic,1 green chilli,small piece tamarind,salt to taste,1 cup water (or as required),2 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds,1 tsp urad dal,pinch of hing / asafoetida,1 dried red chilli (broken),few curry leaves
recipe:
1)Firstly, dry roast 1 cup peanut on medium flame,roast till the peanuts start to separate the skin.
2)Allow to cool down and remove the skin completely.
3)Transfer the peanuts to the blender.
4)Further, add 2 tsp of oil and roast 1 tsp urad dal and 1 tsp chana dal,furthermore, roast 1 green chilli and 2 cloves garlic till the blisters appear.
5)Transfer to the blender, also add in small piece tamarind and salt to taste.
6)Blend to smooth consistency adding 1  cup water, or as required.
7)Now prepare the tempering by heating 2 tsp oil, also add in 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tsp urad dal, pinch of hing, 1 dried red chilli and few curry leaves.
8)Allow the tempering to splutter.
9)Finally, pour the tempering over peanut chutney and serve along with idli or dosa.

name: Coconut Chutney
ingredients: 1 cup Fresh Coconut,1 tsp Chana Dal,1 tbsp Raw Peanuts,2 Green Chillies,1 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Ginger,1/2 tsp Mustard Seeds,1/2 tsp Cumin Seeds,pinch of Hing,2 to 3 dried Red Chillies,6 to 7 Curry Leaves
recipe:
1)Wash and soak chana dal in water for 4 hours.
2)Mix coconut, soaked chana dal, peanuts, green chillies, salt, sugar with some water in mixie pot and make in to smooth paste.
3)Remove coconut paste in mixing bowl.
4)Heat up oil, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, hing, dried red chillies, curry leaves and pour tempering over coconut chutney.
5)Mix tempering well with chutney.
6)Serve with Idly, Dosa, Utthapa!

name: Mint Chutney
ingredients: 1.5 Cup Coriander Leaves,1 Cup Mint Leaves,2 Green Chillies,1 Inch Ginger,1 tbs Peanuts,1 tsp Chat Masala,1 tsp Cumin Seed Powder,1 tsp Sugar,Salt,Lime Juice,Water
recipe:
1)In a mixer, add coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies, ginger, peanuts, chat masala, cumin seed powder and sugar.
2)In order to maintain the color of the green chutney, add salt and lime juice in the end,Grind everything well.
3)Add water that's enough to grind,Coriander Mint Chutney is ready!

name: Mango Chutney
ingredients: 7 shallots diced,1 tbsp ginger,finely diced,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp black mustard seeds,1 tsp cumin seeds,1 tsp chili flakes,1 cinnamon stick,2 lb mango flesh (900 gr),cut into random sizes,1 cup raisins (135 gr),1  cup apple vinegar (315 ml),1 cup granulated sugar (200 gr)
recipe:
1)Heat some oil on medium heat. Add in shallots and cook for around 3 minutes until they softened a bit.
2)Add in ginger, coriander powder, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, chili flakes, cinnamon stick and cook for 1 minute until the powdery taste is gone.
3)Add in mango, raisins, apple vinegar and sugar. Mix everything and bring it to a boil.
4)Reduce the heat and let it simmer for 1 1  hour or until the mixture thickens to your desired consistency. 
5)Stir now and then to prevent it getting burnt, Optional: Mash some of the mango chunks to get that mashed texture or simply leave it as it is.
6)Store in airtight containers and once cooled, keep them in the fridge. 
7)This chutney is absolutely delicious together with my baked tandoori chicken

name: Keema Biryani
ingredients: Cooking oil 1 Cup,Pyaz (Onion) sliced 1 medium,Adrak lehsan paste (Ginger garlic paste) 1 & 1 tbs,Haldee powder (Turmeric powder) 1 tsp,Lal mirch powder (Red chili powder) 1 tbs or to taste,Dhania powder (Coriander powder) 1 tbs,Namak (Salt) 1 & 1 tsp or to taste,Garam masala powder 1 tsp,Beef qeema (Mince) 1 kg (hand chopped),Hari mirch (Green chilli) chopped 2 tbs,Lemon juice 1 tbs, Dahi (Yogurt) whisked 1 Cup,Pani (Water) as required,Sabut kali mirch (Black peppercorns) 1 tsp,Badi elaichi (Black cardamom) 2,Darchini (Cinnamon stick) 2,Tez paat (Bay leaves) 3,Hari elaichi (Green cardamom) 2-3,Laung (Cloves) 4-5,Zeera (Cumin seeds) 1 tsp,Namak (Salt) 1 & 1 tbs,Hara dhania (Fresh coriander) chopped 1 Cup,Podina (Mint leaves) chopped 1 Cup,Hari mirch (Green chillies) 2-3,Chawal (Rice) basmati 1 kg (soaked for 30 minutes),Pyaz (Onion) fried handful,Pyaz (Onion) fried,Zarda ka rang (Yellow food color) 1 tsp or as required,Doodh (Milk) 2 tbs
recipe:
1)In frying pan,add cooking oil,onion and fry until golden brown.
2)Add ginger garlic paste and mix well.
3)Add turmeric powder and mix well.
4)Add red chili powder,coriander powder,salt,garam masala powder,mix well and cook for 2 minutes.
5)Add beef mince,mix well until changes color and cook for 12-15 minutes.
6)Add green chili,lemon juice,mix well and cook until oil separates.
7)Add yogurt and mix well,cover and cook on low flame for 12-15 minutes then cook on high flame until oil separates & set aside.
8)In pot,add water,black peppercorns,black cardamom,cinnamon sticks,bay leaves,green cardamom, cloves,cumin seeds,salt,fresh coriander,mint leaves,green chillies,mix and bring it to boil.
9)Add rice and boil until 3/4th done then strain,In pot,add a layer of boiled rice,cooked mince,fried onion,boiled rice and fried onion.
10)In milk,add yellow food color and mix well.
11)Add dissolve food color,cover and steam cook on low flame for 10-12 minutes.

name: Paneer Biryani
ingredients: For marination :1 cup curd / yogurt (thick),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,tsp turmeric,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,2 tbsp biryani masala,2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped),2 tbsp mint / pudina (chopped),1 tsp oil,1 tbsp lemon juice,For rice:6 cup water,2 pods cardamom,4 cloves,1 inch cinnamon,2 bay leaf / tej patta,1 tsp pepper,1 tsp salt,2 tsp oil,1 chilli (slit),1 cup basmati rice (soaked 20 minutes),For biryani:2 tbsp oil,1 tsp ghee / clarified butter,2 bay leaf / tej patta,1 star anise,1 pod black cardamom,1 mace / javitri,2 pods cardamom,1 tsp shah jeera,onion (sliced),1 tomato (finely chopped),2 tbsp coriander (chopped),2 tbsp mint / pudina (chopped),2 tbsp fried onion,pinch biryani masala,2 tbsp saffron milk,1 tsp ghee / clarified butter,1 cup water,1 tsp salt,15 cubes paneer/ cottage cheese,5 onion (petals),2 capsicum (cubed)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and 1 tsp ghee.
2)Saute 2 bay leaf, 1 star anise, 1 pod black cardamom, 1 mace, 2 pods cardamom and 1 tsp shah jeera.
3)Add ½ onion and saute until it turns golden brown.
4)Also add 1 tomato and saute until it turns soft and mushy.
5)Add in marinated paneer and saute well.
6)Saute until the oil separates from sides. Do not overcook as paneer turns rubbery.
7)Further spread prepared rice uniformly.
8)Also top with 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint and 2 tbsp fried onion.
9)Further sprinkle pinch biryani masala, 2 tbsp saffron milk, 1 tsp ghee and ¼ cup water.9.Cover with aluminium foil and close the lid. You can also use the dough to seal.

11)Finally, enjoy paneer biryani with raita and slices of onion.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Chicken, large pieces with bones 1 kg,Basmati Rice700 gms (4 US cup measure),For Cooking Chicken:Onions, sliced 400 gms (around 5 medium sized onions),Ginger Garlic paste2 tbsp,Tomatoes, sliced4 medium,Green Chillies, slit6 numbers,Coriander leaves, chopped1 cup,Mint leaves, chopped1 cup,Whisked curd/plain yogurt1 cup ,Ready made Biryani Masala5 tbsp,For Cooking Rice: Shahjeera (caraway seeds) 1/2 tsp,Green cardamom 4,Cloves 4,Cinnamon2 pieces,Salt2 1/2 tablespoon,Water to boil the ricearound 2.5  litres,Mint leaves around 10.5 leaves
recipe:
To cook the Chicken: 
1)Heat 6 tbsp oil in a heavy bottom pan and add the sliced onions.
2)Fry on high heat for around 12 mins till the onions are light brown.
3)Add the ginger garlic paste and fry on low heat for 2 mins.
4)Now add the chicken pieces, mix and fry on high heat for 2-3 mins.
5)Add the ready made Biryani Masala, mix and fry on medium heat for 3 mins after adding a splash of water.
6)Readymade Biryani Masala usually contains salt, hence salt is not added while cooking the chicken in this recipe. Do check if the biryani masala you are using has salt in it.
7)Now add the sliced tomatoes, mix it well and cook on medium to low heat for 4-5 mins till soft.
8)Keep the heat on low and add the whisked curd/yogurt. Give a mix and then add the chopped coriander and mint leaves.
9)Cook on low heat for 2 mins till oil separates,Cover & cook on low heat for around 20-25 mins till chicken is tender. Remove lid after 10 mins, give a mix and close the lid again.
10)Dry up any excess water to get a thick gravy.
To cook the Rice:
1)Take one more heavy bottom pan & add around 2.5 litres of water.  Place it on high heat.
2)You may include the water in which rice was soaked in this 2.5 litres for enhanced  flavour & taste,Once the water starts to boil or bubble, add Shah Jeera 1/2 tsp, Green cardamom -4,  Cloves 4, Cinnamon2 pieces and Salt2 1/2 tablespoon (two and half tablespoon).
3)Stir it well to dissolve the salt completely . The water must be very salty.
4)Once the water starts boiling, add the strained basmati rice & stir it well.
5)Continue to boil it on high heat, stirring few times very gently to not break the rice.
6)After 8-9  minutes when the basmati rice is almost done (90%) remove it from heat and strain the water. 
7)Set it aside
Layering the rice and cooked chicken: 
1)Take a heavy bottom pan and spread half the cooked rice as the 1st layer.
2)Now spread the cooked chicken with gravy on top of the rice uniformly as shown in the video.
3)Next, spread the balance rice as the top layer.
4)Sprinkle some mint leaves on top of the rice. Close the lid and cook on low heat for 7-8 mins.
5)Allow it to rest for around 20 mins.Once you open the lid, mix the chicken and rice evenly.

name: Peas Biryani

recipe:

name: Capsicum Gravy
ingredients: For masala paste:2 tbsp peanuts,1 tbsp sesame / til,2 tsp oil,1 tsp coriander seeds,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp methi / fenugreek,few curry leaves,6 dried red chilli,cup dry coconut / kopra,For curry:2 tbsp oil,1 tsp cumin / jeera,onion (finely chopped),1 tsp  ginger garlic paste,1 capsicum (cubed),onion (petals),1 tomato (finely chopped),tsp turmeric,1 tsp salt,cup tamarind extract,2 tbsp coriander (chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a pan dry roast 2 tbsp peanuts until they turn crunchy and skin separates,add in 1 tbsp sesame and roast until they turn aromatic.
2)Transfer to the small mixer and allow to cool completely.
3)Now in the same pan add 1 tsp coriander seeds, 1  tsp cumin, 1  tsp methi,roast for minute,further add few curry leaves, 6 dried red chilli and 1  cup dry coconut,roast until the coconut turns golden brown,allow them to cool completely, and transfer to the same mixi.
4)Now blend to coarse powder without adding any water. keep aside.
5)In a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 1 tsp cumin,add in 1  onion followed by 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute well.
6)Additionally add 1 capsicum, 1  onion and saute for 2 minutes,saute until the onions shrink slightly.
7)Further add 1 tomato and saute well,now add 1  tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt and mix well,add in prepared masala and saute for  minute,now add 1  cup tamarind extract and mix well.
8)Add water as required adjusting consistency,cover and cook for 10 minutes, or until oil separates.
9)Finally, add 2 tbsp coriander and enjoy capsicum masala curry with roti.

name: Capsicum Rice
ingredients: For masala powder:2 tbsp peanuts / groundnuts,1 tsp chana dal,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp coriander seeds,1 tsp cumin seeds / jeera,1 tsp sesame seeds / til,4-5 dried kashmiri red chili,Other ingredients: 2 tbsp oil / ghee,1 tsp mustard seeds / rai,few curry leaves / kadi patta,1 medium sized onion (thinly sliced),1 cup capsicum (green, yellow, red, thinly sliced),1 tsp turmeric / haldi,1 tsp garam masala,salt to taste,2 cups cooked basmati rice / leftover rice,2 tbsp coriander leaves (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a thick bottomed pan dry roast peanuts till the skin separates.
2)Further add chana dal, urad dal, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, sesame seeds and red chili,dry roast on low flame till the spices turn aromatic.
3)Cool down the spices completely and coarsely powder them,keep aside,in a large kadai heat oil or ghee.
4)Further add mustard seeds and curry leaves,saute slightly and allow to splutter,additionally.
5)Add onions and saute till they turn slightly golden brown.
6)Also saute capsicum,furthermore add turmeric, garam masala, prepared masala powder and salt,saute for a minute or till the spice powder turn aromatic.
7)Now add cooked basmati rice or leftover rice,mix gently without breaking rice grains,cover and simmer for 5 minutes or till the rice absorbs the masala.
8)Further add coriander leaves and serve.
9)Finally, serve capsicum masala rice garnished with few onion slices, lemon and coriander leaves.

name: Stuffed Capsicum
ingredients: For stuffing: 2 tsp oil,onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger-garlic paste,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder,1 tsp turmeric / haldi,salt to taste,1 tsp coriander powder / daniya powde,1 tsp cumin powder / jeera powder,2 potato (boiled & mashed),tsp garam masala powder,tsp aamchur powder / dry mango powder,1 cup paneer / cottage cheese (crumbled),Other ingredients: 4 small capsicum (colour of choice),3 tbsp oil,handful of mozzarella / cheddar cheese
recipe:
1)Firstly, prepare the stuffing by sauting onions and ginger-garlic paste in oil.
2)Further add spices and salt,saute on low flame till the spices turn aromatic.
3)Additionally, add boiled potato and crumbled paneer,mix well till the spices are mixed well.
4)Keep aside,prepare the capsicum, by cutting the head and removing the seeds.
5)Now stuff 2 tbsp of prepared masala,place them on kadai with 3 tbsp oil.
6)Also cover with capsicum head,cover and simmer for 30 minutes or bake at 180  degree  celsius for 40 minutes.
7)Cook the capsicum well or till they change in colour and also softened and shrinks little.
8)Now take off the head and keep aside.
9)Garnish with few mozzarella cheese and place the head of capsicum again.
10)Cover and simmer for 5 minutes or till the cheese melts completely.
11)Finally, serve cheesy stuffed capsicum along with rice or roti

name: Capsicum 65
ingredients: Oil - for deep fry,Yellow capsicum - 1,Red capsicum - 1,Salt - 1 tsp,White pepper powder - 1 tsp,Garam masala - 1/2 tsp,Ginger garlic paste - 1 tsp,Tomato sauce - 1 tbsp,Chili sauce - 1 tbsp,Corn flour - 3 tbs,All purpose flour [maida] - one and a half tbsp,FOR GARNISH:Cashew nuts - few,Green chilies - 2,Garlic [chopped] - 1/2 tsp,Ginger [chopped] - 1/2 tsp,Chili sauce - 1 tsp,Tomato sauce - 1 tsp,Curry leaves - few,Spring onions [ chopped] - 1 tsp
recipe:

3)Heat oil for deep frying. Make sure the oil is hot enough for deep-frying by inserting a wooden ladle into the center of the oil.

name: Capsicum Chutney
ingredients: 1 tbsp oil,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp channa dal,4 kashmiri red chilli,1 garlic clove (chopped),onion (finely chopped),1 to mato (finely chopped),1 capsicum (roughly diced),salt to taste1 tbsp water (to blend),For tempering:1 tsp oil,tsp mustard seeds,tsp urad dal,pinch of hing / asafetida,few curry leaves
recipe:

6)Once they are cooled completely, take them in a blender and add some salt and a tbsp of water.

9)Once they splutter add curry leaves and pour the tempering over chutney,enjoy capsicum chutney with your favourite dosa, idli or with plain rice.

name: Paneer Capsicum
ingredients: For spice mix:tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp coriander seeds,tsp pepper,tsp fennel / saunf,For curry:1 tbsp butter,15 cube paneer / cottage cheese,10 cube capsicum,1 tsp,cumin / jeera,1 bay leaf / tej patta,4 cloves / lavang,1 inch cinnamon,3 pods cardamom / elachi1 tsp kasuri methi,1 onion (finely chopped),2 tbsp mint pudina,(chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,4 tbsp coriander leaves (chopped),tsp turmeric / haldi,tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,tsp salt,1 tomato (finely chopped),2 tbsp curd / yogurt (whisk),2 tbsp cashew paste,1 cup water,2 tbsp cream,tsp garam masala

name: Egg Gravy
ingredients: Boiled eggs 8 nos,Oil for shallow frying,Turmeric 1 tsp,Oil 3 tbsp,Whole spices: Cumin seeds (jeera) 1 tsp,Cloves 3-4 nos,Cinnamon 1 inch,Whole red chilli 1 no,Green cardamom 2-3 nos,Onions 3-4 medium size (chopped),Ginger garlic paste 2 tbsp,Tomato puree of 3-4 medium size tomatoes,Green chillies 1-2 nos. (slit),Powdered spices:Turmeric powder 1/4th tsp,Coriander powder 1 tbsp,Red chilli powder,Fennel powder (saunf powder) 1 tsp,Salt to taste,Hot water as required,Garam masala 1 tsp,Kasuri methi 1 tsp,Fresh coriander leaves 1 tbsp (chopped)
recipe:

9)Your egg masala curry is ready to be served, serve hot with roti or paratha of your choice.

name: Egg Burji

name: Egg Omelette

name: Paneer 65

(chopped),Red chili powder 1 tbsp,Black pepper powder a pinch,Salt to taste,Paneer 300 gm (cubes),Oil for frying,Making the sauce:Oil 1 tbsp,Mustard seeds 1 tsp,Dry red chillies 4 nos,Green chillies 2-3 nos.,Ginger 1 tbsp (chopped),Garlic 3 tbsp (chopped),,Curry leaves 8-10 nos,Red chili sauce 1 tbsp,Red chili powder 1 tsp ,Jeera powder 1 tsp,Coriander powder 1 tsp,Garam masala 1 tsp,Black pepper powder a pinch,Salt to taste ,Curd 1 cup + corn flour 1 tbsp,Water 50 ml,Spring onion greens 1 tbsp

name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: Boneless chicken 1kg,For marinade,Mustard oil 2 tbsp,Kashmir Red chilli powder 2 tbsp,Ginger garlic paste 2 tbsp,Dhaniya (Coriander) powder 1 tbsp,Jeera (cumin) powder 1 tsp,Haldi (turmeric) powder 1 tsp,Kasuri methi 1 tsp,Amchur powder 1 tsp,Black salt 1 tsp,Garam masala 1 tsp,Fresh mint 1 tbsp,Fresh Coriander 1 tbsp,Salt to taste,Thick curd 1.5 cup,Lemon juice 1 tbsp,Live charcoal + ghee ,Oil for grilling
recipe:
1)Start by slicing the chicken breast, you can also use chicken thighs, as per your convenience, slice them thinly for even and faster cooking.
2)For marinade, take mixing bowl, add Mustard oil and Kashmiri Red chilli powder, mix well to bleed it's natural red colour. 
3)Further add the remaining marinade ingredients and mix well, now add the thinly sliced chicken, mix and coat well and keep it marinated for at-least an hour or two, but incase if you have time keep it for as long as you can for more juicy and flavourful chicken, please do not go beyond 20 hours in the fridge or else the chicken may spoil. 
4)Smoke the marinated chicken for 4-5 minutes to impart the smoky flavour. 
5)You can smoke the chicken at three stage that'll make difference of smoke flavour in the dish, one is, you can smoke at the marination stage where you'll get subtle flavour of smoke, second you can smoke after grilling and third you can smoke at final stage just before serving the dominant smoke flavour, the choice is yours. 
6)Once it's been marinated and smoked, set a grill pan or any pan and grill the chicken on both the sides until golden brown in colour, you can also grill them oven for 5-6minutes at 220 degree C.
7)Once the chicken is grilled let them cool for a while and shred them in thin strips. Keep aside for later use.

name: Chicken Kabaab

recipe:
1)Add the onions, garlic, ginger and green chillies in a food processor and chop them finely, if you don?t have food processer then you have to chop it with knife.

3)Transfer the chopped onions to a muslin cloth and squeeze out to remove excess moisture.
4)Mince the chicken finely with knife or directly mince it in the food processor or mixer grinder.
5)Transfer the minced chicken and chopped onions to a mixing bowl, further add freshly chopped mint and coriander leaves, powdered spices, Salt & pepper to taste and ghee, mix and combine well.
6)Make space in between and place a bowl, place a live charcoal in the centre and add few drops of ghee, cover and smoke for 3-5 minutes.
7)Dip your hands in water to prevent the chicken mixture sticking to your palms while shaping it over a bamboo skewers, if you have steel skewers please use them as well.
8)Make as many as you wish and grill them,Set a pan on medium heat, add ghee and grill the seekh from all sides until golden brown in colour. You can also grill them on open fire and do apply ghee or butter at regular interval for getting the golden colour as well as charred flavour.
9)Your chicken seekh kebab is ready to be served, serve hot by squeezing some fresh lemon and sprinkling some chat masala, serve with chutney and some fresh mint leaves and sliced onions.

name: Lemon Chicken
ingredients: Chicken, large pieces with bones 500 gms,For Marination:Salt1 tsp,Crushed Pepper1 tsp (coarse granules),Lemon Juice2 tsp,Thick whisked curd/yogurt2 tbsp,Ginger,Garlic Paste1.5 tsp,Whole Spices:Green Cardamom3,Cloves-3,Cinnamon2,Black Peppercorns10,Other Ingredients:Whisked curd/plain yogurt ,4 tbsp,Crushed Pepper1/4 tsp,Green Chillies, slit 4.Garam Masala Powder1/4 tsp Oil 3 tbsp,Buttera dollop (1 tbsp) Coriander leaves,finely chopped1 tbsp
recipe:
1)Heat oil & butter in a flat pan and add the whole spices.
2)Once it splutters, add the marinated chicken & fry on high heat for 1 min and then flip the chicken pieces.
3)Continue to fry for 2-3 more mins on high turning the pieces a few times.
4)Add the balance marinade and continue to fry on both sides for another 5 mins on medium heat till evenly browned.
5)Now reduce the heat to low, add the whisked curd/plain yogurt, 1/4 tsp crushed Pepper, slit green chillies and mix everything well.
6)Cover & cook on low heat for 15 mins, flipping and stirring after 10 mins. Cook till the liquid has nearly dried and the chicken is tender.
7)Now add the garam masala powder, mix well and fry for another 5 mins till the chicken pieces are browned.
8)Garnish with finely chopped coriander leaves and serve hot. 
Preparation:
1)Crush the black peppercorns.
2)Marinate the chicken pieces with items indicated. 
3)Mix & set aside for 1 hr.Whisk the curd/yogurt.
4)Slit the green chillies and fine chop the coriander leaves.

name: Brinjal Chicken
ingredients: 1.5 Lb (680g) Chicken Thighs,3 Eggplants,1.5 Cup Rice,1 Small Onion,1/2 Tsp Ground Cardamom,1/2 Tsp Coriander Seeds,1/2 Tsp Ground Cinnamon,Curry Powder,Salt,Black Pepper,Vegetable Oil
recipe:
Preparations:
1) Dice the onion.
2)Slice the eggplants.
3)Grind the coriander seeds.
Directions:
1) Fry the onions with vegetable oil until golden.
2)Stir in ground cardamom, coriander seeds, curry powder, black pepper, and cinnamon and continue frying for 2 more minutes.
3)Stir in the chicken thighs and continue frying for 10 minutes.
4)Add salt and enough water to top the chicken thighs one inch deep.
5)Cover the pot with a lid (leave ajar), over medium-low heat simmer for 30 minutes or until the chicken thighs are well cooked.
6)Fry the eggplants with vegetable oil (Garnishing with salt).
7)Transfer 1.5 cup of the chicken broth over to the rice pot.
8)Stir in salt and over medium heat, boil the rice until the water is evaporated (about 10 to 15 minutes).
9)Add 2 tbsp vegetable oil to a large pot.
10)Lay the chicken thighs onto the pot and top with the fried eggplants and cover with the rice.
11)Cover the pot with a napkin and a lid.
12)Over medium-low heat, cook for 45 minutes.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: For Chicken Masala:5-6 no Black cardamom,12-15 Green cardamom ,2 tbsp Coriander seeds,1 no Mace,1 tsp Black Pepper corn,1 tsp Cumin seeds,2-3 Cloves,1 tsp,Salt,For Marinating Chicken:750 gm Chicken (with bone) cut in big pieces ,1.5 inch Ginger,5 no Garlic clove,2-3 Green chillies,1 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Salt,For Tempering:1 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Cumin
recipe:
For Chicken Masala:
1)In a pan, add black cardamom, green cardamom, coriander seeds, mace, black peppercorns, cumin seeds, cloves and salt dry roast on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.
2)Transfer it into a grinder jar and grind into a fine powder. Keep it aside for further use.
3)For Marinating Chicken,In a motarpestel, add ginger, garlic, green chilli, salt, oil and make a smooth paste out of it,In a bowl, add chicken and prepared ginger garlic paste marinated well. Keep it for 10-15 minutes.
4)For Tempering:Heat oil in a heavy bottom pot, add cumin seeds, black cardamom and saute well.
5)Add onion and saute for 5 minutes until translucent.
6)Add turmeric powder, degi red chilli powder, coriander powder and saute for 2-4 minutes.
7)Add marinated chicken and mix everything well.
8)Add tomato puree, water as required and cook for at least 15-20 minutes on medium flame.
9)Add prepared chicken masala and mix well,Garnish it with coriander sprig and serve hot with mirch roti.

name: Chicken
ingredients: all the ingredients required to prepare chicken is present above

name: Brinjal Ravafry
ingredients: 1 tbsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder,1 tsp turmeric / haldi,pinch of hing / asafoetida,2 tbsp rice flour,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp water,1 brinjal / baingan /eggplant (thickly sliced),oil for deep frying,For rava coating:1 cup rava / semolina / sooji,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 tbsp chilli powder, 1  tsp turmeric, pinch of hing, 2 tbsp rice flour and 1  tsp salt.
2)Combine well making sure the spices are mixed.
3)Now add 2 tbsp water and prepare a masala paste.
4)Add in 1 brinjal thickly slices and coat with masala paste.
5)Coat well and rest for 20 minutes.
6)Meanwhile prepare rava mixture by mixing 1  cup rava, 1  tsp chilli powder and 1  tsp salt.
7)Now coat the marinated baingan with rava on both sides.
8)Shallow fry or pan fry in hot oil.
9)Fry on low flame making sure to cook well.
10)Now flip over and cook brinjal on both the sides. do not over cook as then brinjal will loose shape.
11)Finally, serve brinjal fry recipe / brinjal rava fry as a side dish.

name: Brinjal Bharta
ingredients: 400 grams brinjal / baingan / eggplant,3 clove garlic,1 chilli,1 tsp oil,Other ingredients:2 tbsp oil,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 dried red chilli (broken),1 inch ginger (finely chopped),2 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tomato (finely chopped),1 tsp salt,1 tsp garam masala,2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, take large-sized brinjal and make 4 slits,stuff in 3 garlic and 1 chilli in each slit,grease the baingan with oil as it helps to peel off the skin easily once roasting,start roasting on gas stove flipping occasionally.
2)Roast until brinjal turns dark and cooked completely from inside,cool the baingan completely and start to peel the skin off.
3)Take off the head of brinjal and check if the brinjal is cooked completely from inside,mash the eggplant with the help of a fork. 
4)Keep aside,in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 1 tsp cumin, 1 dried red chilli, 1 inch ginger and 2 clove garlic,saute 1 onion until it shrinks slightly.
5)Further add 1  tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp coriander powder and saute till spices turn aromatic,add in 1 tomato and saute until tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
6)Now add in roasted and mashed brinjal along with 1 tsp salt,mix and mash for 5 minutes or until flavours are well combined,add 1  tsp garam masala and 2 tbsp coriander. 
7)Mix well,finally, enjoy baingan ka bartha with hot phulka or rice.

name: Brinjal Masala
ingredients: 6 small sized purple brinjal / baingan / eggplant,3 tbsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds / rai,1 tsp methi / fenugreek seeds,few curry leaves,1 onion (finely chopped),1 cup tamarind water,1 tsp jaggery / gud (optional),2 tbsp coriander leaves (finely chopped),for onion-tomato paste:2 tsp oil,1 onion (thinly sliced),1 tsp ginger garlic paste / adrak lasun paste,1 tsp turmeric powder / haldi,1 to mato (finely chopped),1 tsp coriander powder / daniya powder,1 tsp cumin powder / jeera powder,1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder,1 tsp garam masala powder,salt to taste,For stuffing:2 tbsp sesame seeds / til,1 cup coconut (fresh / desiccated / dry),cup peanuts / groundnuts (roasted & peeled),1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder,salt to taste
recipe:
1)Firstly, take the cut brinjal and stuff the prepared stuffing,and fry on medium flame with 3 tbsp of oil,cover and simmer for 2-4 minutes or till they are half cooked.
2)Further, take off and keep aside,now in the same kadai add mustard seeds, methi and curry leaves,allow to splutter.
3)Further add onions and saute well.
4)Also add prepared onion-tomato paste and continue to saute.
5)Furthermore, place the stuffed and fried brinjals,and pour tamarind wate add a piece of jaggery.
6)Mix gently, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
7)Stir occasionally and cook till the brinjal gets cooked completely.
8)Finally, serve baingan masala with chapathi or roti.

name: Brinjal Sabji
ingredients: 3 tbsp oil,1 tsp mustard / rai,1 tsp urad dal,tsp chana dal,few curry leaves:,1 onion (sliced),2 green chilli (slit),1 to mato (finely chopped),tsp turmeric / haldi,tsp salt,1 baingan / eggplant (chopped),2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tbsp oil and splutter 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp urad dal, 1  tsp chana dal and few curry leaves.
2)Add in 1 sliced onion and saute,also add 2 green chilli and saute well.
3)Additionally, add in 1 tomato and saute till tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
4)Furthermore add 1  tsp turmeric and 1  tsp salt. saute well,now add in 1 chopped baingan and mix gently.
5)Do not over mix, as baigan turns mushy,cover and simmer for 10 minutes or till baingan turns soft.
6)Stir occasionally, making sure the baingan doesn't burn.
7)Cover and cook till the baigan cooks well and releases oil.
8)Add in 2 tbsp coriander and mix well,finally, serve baigan ki sabji recipe with rice or roti.

name: Mutton Masala
ingredients: Mutton 750 gm,Salt to taste,Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp,Lemon juice 1 tsp,Curd 1 cup,Ghee 4 tbsp,Whole spices:Bay leaves 2-3 nos,Green cardamom 3-4 nos,Black cardamom 1-2 nos,Cloves 3-4 nos,Cinnamon 1 inch,Onion 5-6 medium size (sliced),Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp,Green chilli pastes 1 tbsp,Turmeric powder 1 tsp,Coriander powder 2 tbsp,Red chilli powder 1 tbsp,Tomato puree 3 medium size ,Salt to taste,Hot water 250 ml,Garam masala 1 tsp,Fresh coriander 1 tbsp (chopped)
recipe:
1)In a mixing bowl add mutton, salt, ginger garlic paste, lemon juice and curd, mix well and marinate the mutton for at least 30 minutes.
2)Set a deep pan vessel or a kadhai on medium flame, add ghee and whole spices, sate them for few seconds, add onions and cook until golden brown.
3)Add ginger garlic paste and green chilli paste and further cook for 4-5 minutes, add the marinated mutton along with the remaining marinade, mix well and cook on medium high heat for about 10-12 minutes,Low down the heat and now further cook for 20-25 minutes while keep stirring in intervals.
4)Add turmeric powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder, mix well and cook for 15-20 minutes keeping the flame on medium heat while stirring in intervals,Add the tomato puree and salt and further cook for 7-8 minutes.
5)Add hot water to cook the mutton for 10-12 minutes, now cover and cook 20-25 minutes more or until the mutton is tender and soft. Keep stirring in intervals. You can adjust the quantity of water depending on how thick or thin you ant your masala gravy to be. 
6)Check for seasoning.
7)Add garam masala and freshly chopped coriander leaves and mix well, your mutton masala is ready to be served, serve hot with paratha or roti of your choice

name: Mutton Fry
ingredients: Mutton 500 gms (mostly boneless),To Pressure Cook mutton:Turmeric Powder1/2 tsp,Salt1 tsp,Water200 ml,Oil1/2 tbsp,To make Masala Powder:Coriander Seeds2 tsp,Black Peppercorns1.52 tsp (as per preference),Cumin Seeds1/2 tsp,Fennel Seeds3/4 tsp,Red Chillies2,Cloves3,Cinnamon 2,Green Cardamom 2,Other Ingredients:Small Shallots,halved or thick slices 150 gms  after peeling ,Curry leaves  2 sprigs,Green Chillies,slit 3,Ginger Garlic paste 2 tsp,Chopped Coriander  3 tbsp,Salt for seasoning,Oil 4 tbsp
recipe:
1)Take a pressure cooker and add the mutton, turmeric powder, salt, little oil and water. 
2)Pressure cook up to 4 whistles till mutton is tender. 
3)Alternatively, add all the items in a pan and cover & cook for around 45 mins till meat is tender.
4)Take a pan and add all the spices to make the masala powder. 
5)Dry roast on low heat for 2-3 mins. Set aside to cool and grind to a coarse powder.
6)Peel the shallots and cut them into halves. In case the shallots are big, make quarters or thick slices.
7)Slit the green chillies and chop the coriander leaves,Heat oil in a pan & add the shallots. 
8)Fry on medium heat for 1-2 mins and add the slit green chillies and curry leaves. 
9)Continue to fry on medium heat for another 5-6 mins till the shallots are translucent and light brown at the edges.
10)Now add the Ginger Garlic paste and fry on low heat for 2 mins.
11)Add the boiled mutton along with the stock and give a mix. 
12)Bring to a boil.
13)Add the masala powder made in the grinder earlier and give a mix.
14)Fry this on high heat for around 6-7 mins till all the stock is absorbed and the mutton is fried and becomes dark in colour.
15)Check and add salt for seasoning if needed at this stage.
16)Add the chopped coriander leaves and fry on high heat for 1-2 mins till oil separates.

name: Mutton Korma
ingredients: Ghee 4 tbsp,Onion 4-5 medium size (sliced),Cashew nuts 8-10 nos,Mutton 1 kg,Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp,Salt to taste,Curd 2 cups,Red chilli powder 1 tbsp,Coriander powder 4 tbsp,Turmeric powder 1 tsp,Cumin powder (jeera) 1 tsp,Lemon juice 1 tsp,Cumin seeds (Jeera) 1 tsp,Black peppercorns 3-4 nos,Cinnamon stick 1 inch,Bay leaf 1-2 nos,Cloves 4-5 nos,Black cardamom 1 no,Green Cardamom 3-4 nos,Mace 1 no,Nutmeg 1/4th (grated),Green chillies 3-4 nos. (slit0),Ginger garlic paste 2 tbsp,Hot water 750 ml,Saffron infused water 1 tbsp,Kewra water 1 tsp,Fresh garam masala 2 tsp
recipe:
1)Heat ghee in a wok, add sliced onions and cook on medium heat until onions start to turn brown. 
2)Spread fried onions on a paper towel. Soak the cashew nuts in hot water for 10 minutes. 
3)Grind the fried onions and keep aside. Also grind the soaked cashew to make fine cashew paste. 
4) In a mixing bowl add mutton, ginger garlic paste, salt, curd, red chilly powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder and lemon juice, marinade the mutton well for minimum 1  an hour. 
5)Heat the same ghee used for frying onions, add the whole spices, green chillies and ginger garlic paste, saut‚ for 2-3 minute. 
6) Add the marinated mutton and cook on medium flame until ghee is released. 
7) Add the freshly prepared crushed fried onions. 
8) Add the cashew paste and cook for 8-10 minutes. 
9) Add the hot water and salt, mix well. 
10) Cover and cook on low medium flame for 1- 1.5 hours or until the mutton is cooked and tender. 
11) Add the saffron infused water, kewda water and fresh garam masala. Mix well and Cover and cook further for 8-10 minutes on low flame. 
12)Serve hot with roti or paratha or rice.

name: Mutton Puloa
ingredients: For Marinating Mutton:600 gm Mutton, (with bone),2 tbsp Oil,1 tsp Degi red chilli powder,Salt to taste,2 Dry Red chillies broken in half,2-3 fresh Green chillies,broken in half,1 medium Onion, roughly chopped,For Curd Mixture:1 cup Curd,1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic paste,1 tbsp Coriander powder,tsp Turmeric powder 1 tsp,Degi red chilli powder,1 heaped tbsp Fried onion,Few Mint leaves,For Mutton Pulao:1 heaped tbsp Ghee,2 inch Cinnamon stick,10-12 Black pepper cons,1 Black cardamom,Marinated Mutton,Curd Mixture,Water,1 tbsp Fried onion,Few Mint leaves,Salt to taste,600 gm Basmati rice soaked,For Garnish:Fresh Mint leaves
recipe:
1)For Marinating Mutton,In a bowl add mutton, oil, degi red chilli powder, salt, dry red chillies, green chillies, onion and mix everything properly and keep aside for at least 30-60 minutes.
2)For Curd Mixture,In a bowl add curd, ginger-garlic paste, coriander powder, turmeric powder, degi red chilli powder, fried onions, mint leaves and mix everything properly and keep aside for further use.
3)For Mutton Pulao,In a cooker heat ghee and add cinnamon stick, black cardamom, black pepper cons, marinated mutton and saute on medium heat until the mutton is light brown.
4)Now add the curd mixture and saute until fragrant or until the ghee starts coming up, then add water and close the lid then give it 3-5 whistles or until 80% cooked.
5)Let the cooker cool down then remove the lid and add water, fried onion, mint leaves, salt then bring it to a boil.
6)Once boiled add basmati rice, mix it once, now again close the lid and give it 2-3 whistles.
7)Switch off the flames and let the cooker cool down, remove the lid and let the rice set of 5-10 and then serve hot in a serving plate and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Mutton Biryani
ingredients: For marinade:Mutton - 1 kg,Turmeric powder - 3/4 tsp,Chili powder - 2 tsp,Salt - 1 tsp,For masala paste:Shallots - 6 nos.,Garlic cloves - 25 nos. (small cloves),Ginger - 1 piece (chopped),Green chili - 2 nos.,Red chili - 6 nos,Grated Coconut - 2 tsp,Few Mint leaves,Few Coriander leaves,Coriander powder - 1 tsp,Water,For pressure cooking:,Ghee - 2 tbsp,Oil - 1 tbsp ,Cinnamon,Cardamom pods,Cloves ,Bay leaves ,Onion - 4 nos. (thinly sliced),Tomato - 3 nos. (chopped),Ground Masala paste - 3 tbsp (approx.),Salt - 2 tsp + as required  ,Diluted coconut milk - 3 cups,Coriander leaves,Mint leaves,Basmati Rice - 3 cups (soaked for 30 mins)
recipe:
For marinade:
1)In a mixing bowl add mutton, turmeric powder, chili powder, and salt. Rub these ingredients well into the mutton pieces,Let it sit for 15 minutes.
2)For masala paste:In a blender add shallots, garlic cloves, ginger, green chili, red chili, grated coconut, mint leaves, coriander leaves and coriander powder.
3)Add little water and grind to a paste. Masala paste is ready. Keep this aside.
For pressure cooking:
1)Soak basmati rice for 30 minutes in water.
2)Heat ghee and oil in a pressure cooker. Add the whole spices (cinnamon, cardamom pods, clove, bay leaves).
3)Add the thinly sliced onions and saute till they turn brown in color.
4)Then add tomatoes and saute for few minutes.
5)Now add the ground masala paste and saute for few minutes.
6)Add the mutton pieces and salt. Mix well.
7)Add diluted coconut milk, coriander leaves, mint leaves and pressure cook the mutton for 6-7 whistles.
8)Once mutton is cooked check for seasoning,Keep the flame on low and add soaked basmati rice.
9)Cover the cooker with lid and let the steam come out,now place the weight and cook for 7 minutes.
10)Turn off the stove and let it sit for 5 minutes,Enjoy the pressure cooker mutton biryani with raita or any gravy of your choice.

name: Mint Mutton
ingredients: Mutton 1000 g,Coriander leaves 2b,Mint leaves 2b,Soya (Dill) leaves 1 b,Tomato 1n,Whole garam masala (each)3n,Peppercorn 1ts,Coriander seeds 1 ts,Shahi jeera,1 ts,Green chilly 6n,Ginger 1 inch piece,Garlic 4 cloves,Salt,Onions chopped 1 n,Turmeric pinch,Bay leaves 2 n
recipe:
1)Heat a pan add bay leaves, whole garam masala, pepper corn, coriander seeds, shahi jeera, dry roast the all ingredients and let it cool down and make a fine  powder.
2)Heat oil in a pan add green chilly, ginger, garlic, tomato, mint, coriander, dill leaves, cook this till the greens are cooked, let it cool down, put into the blender and make a paste.
3) In the same pan add oil, chopped onions, salt, turmeric, cook this till onions are slightly golden colour and add mutton pieces, garam masala, water, put the lid on and let it cook in a medium flame  till the mutton is tender, then add paste of green vegetables mix this and cook it for few minutes.
4)Serve this with roti, phulka and naan.

name: Fish fry
ingredients: For marination:Turmeric powder1/4 tsp,Red Chilli Powder1 tsp,Salt3/4 tsp,For Masala Paste:Cumin seeds1 tsp,Dried Red Chillies2,Garlic10 cloves,Green Chillies2-3 (cut into 2),Red Chilli Powder1.5 tsp,Coriander Powder1.5 tsp,Turmeric Powder1/4 tsp,Other Ingredients:Onion, grated2 medium (around 130 gms),Kasuri Methi (dried Fenugreek leaves)1 tsp,Curry leaves15-20,,Tamarind, soaked in water4 tbsp juice,Thick coconut milk4 tbsp,Salt to taste1/2 tsp,Coriander leaves for garnishing2 tbsp,Oil 3 tbsp + oil for pan frying the fish pieces
recipe:
1)Clean, wash and pat dry the fish pieces. Add the turmeric, red chilli powder, salt and mix well. Set aside for 30 mins.
2)To prepare the Masala paste, take a pan and dry roast the red chillies and cumin seeds on low heat for 1 minute. 
3)Now add the garlic cloves and continue roasting on low heat for another 2 mins. Set aside to cool. 
4)Add them to blender/grinder along with the green chillies.
5) Coarse grind,Now add 3-4 tbsp of water and blend it into a smooth paste. 
6)The masala paste should have thin consistency so you can add more water to make into a thin consistency.
7)To pan fry the marinated fish, add oil to a frying pan and place the fish pieces side by side.
8)Fry on medium heat for 2 mins and turn it on the other side. Continue to fry on medium heat for 2 mins. 
9)Take these out on a plate,Process:Heat oil in a flat pan or kadai.
10)Add the grated onions and fry on medium heat for 7-8 mins till light brown in colour
11)Now add the masala paste and give a mix, add 1/2 tsp salt to it and continue to fry on medium heat for 3 mins till water dries up and oil separates.
12)Add the dried fenugreek leaves (Kasuri Methi) and fry 1 min on medium heat. 
13)Add the curry leaves and fry on low to medium heat for 2 mins,Now add the tamarind juice, give a mix and then add 250 ml water. 
14)Cook it on medium heat till it comes to a boil.
15)Lower the heat and place the fried fish pieces side by side and cover & cook on low heat for 5 mins.
16)Remove lid and flip the fish pieces. Add the thick coconut milk, give a mix.
17)Cover & cook for another 10 mins on low heat till oil separates.
18)Garnish with the chopped coriander leaves, mix and simmer for a minute.
19)Serve with rice.

name: Tandoori Fish
ingredients: 400 grams Salmon fish fillets,cut into thick slabs,1 cup hung yogurt,3 teaspoons degi red chilli powder + for sprinkling,1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste,Salt to taste,1 teaspoon garam masala powder,1 teaspoon dried fenugreek powder (kasuri methi),1 tablespoon mustard oil,Juice of lemon,3 cloves,1 teaspoon ghee,1 teaspoon oil,1 tablespoon butter,Mint mayonnaise chutney for garnishing,1-2 lollo rosso lettuce leaves,Mustard micro greens for garnishing,Lemon slice for garnishing,Mini onion rings for garnishing
recipe:
1)To prepare marinade, take hung yogurt in a bowl. 
2)Add chilli powder, ginger-garlic paste, salt, garam masala powder, dried fenugreek powder, mustard oil and lemon juice and whisk well,Halve the fish fillets, add to the marinade and coat well from both sides. 
3)Refrigerate to marinate for 2 hours.
4)Place a piece of coal directly on heat.
5)Place the marinated fish fillets on the sides of a plate and place a small steel bowl in the center.
6)Put the hot coal in the steel bowl, add cloves and ghee in it and cover the plate. Set aside for 2 minutes.
7)Remove the steel bowl from the plate,Heat a non-stick grill pan, add oil and butter. Place the prepared fish fillets and cook from both sides for 2-3 minutes each or till golden brown, basting with the hot oil-butter mixture in the pan. 
8)Transfer on another plate,Put a spoonful of mint mayonnaise chutney on one side of a serving platter and spread using a brush.
9) Place lollo rosso lettuce leaves on other side and place cooked fish fillets on top.
10)Garnish with some mustard micro greens, a lemon slice and mini onion rings. Sprinkle some chilli powder on one side of the mint mayonnaise chutney garnish and serve hot.

name: Coconut Fish Gravy
ingredients: Boneless fish fillets  500 gms (Basa, Cod, Haddock,Sole or Catfish),For the Tempering:,Mustard Seeds 1/2 tsp,Curry Leaves 1015 leaves,Green Chillies chopped 23 nos,Onion Masala paste:,Onion, cubed 2 medium (150 gms.),Ginger chopped 1? piece,Garlic cloves 6,Cumin Seeds 1 tsp,Spice Powders:Turmeric Powder 1/2 tsp,Red Chilli Powder 2 tsp,Tomato pur‚e or paste 3 tbsp (readymade),Coconut Milk 1 cup (225 ml),White Vinegar 2 tsp,Refined Oil 3 tbsp,Salt 1 tsp
recipe:
1)Make a paste of the cubed onions, peeled and chopped ginger, peeled garlic and cumin seeds. 
2)Remove and set aside,Chop the green chillies and wash & take out the curry leaves.
3)For the coconut milk you can use readymade coconut milk or make fresh coconut milk from fresh coconut at home.
4)For the fish, take boneless fish fillets and cut them into thick slices,Heat oil in a pan and add the mustard seeds. 
5)Once it splutters, add the curry leaves and the chopped green chillies,Give a stir and then add the Onion paste. 
6)Give a mix and continue to fry on medium heat for 78 mins till light brown in color.
7)Now add the tomato pur‚e, give a mix and fry on low heat for 2 mins,Now add the Turmeric, Red Chilli Powder and salt. 
8)Give a mix and fry on medium heat for 23 mins after adding 3 tbsp water till oil separates.
9)Add the coconut milk and 200 ml water, give a mix and cover & cook on low heat for 5 mins till oil separates.
10)Now add the boneless fish pieces and give a mix. Cover & cook on low heat for 10 mins.
11)Add the white vinegar, shake the pan to give a mix. Simmer on low heat for 2 mins.
12)Switch off heat, cover the lid and let it rest for 1530 mins before serving.
13)Serve it with rice.

name: Amritsar Fish
ingredients: First Marination:500 gms Fish Fillet,sliced,Salt to taste,1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste,Lime Juice,1 tbsp Mustard Oil,1 tsp Kasuri Methi,Crushed,1 tsp AsafoetidaSecond Marination:1 tsp Degi Mirch Powder,2 tbsp Curd,1 tbsp Rice Flour,2 tbsp Gram Flour,1 tsp Carom Seeds,Oil for frying,1 tbsp Mustard Oil for fish tikka,For Garnish: Onion rings,Lemon wedge,Coriander sprig
recipe:
For Marination:
1)In a mixing bowl, add fish sliced, add salt to taste, ginger garlic paste, lemon juice, mustard oil,kasuri methi, asafoetida mix everything well and keep it aside for 10 minutes.
For second Marination:
1)In the same bowl, add degi mirch powder, curd, rice flour, gram flour, carom seeds mix everything well and set aside.
2)Heat oil in a kadai, once its hot deep fry the marinated fish till nicely done.
For Fish Tikka Satye:
1)Heat oil in a grill pan, skewer the marinated fish in a satye stick and grill nicely till crisp golden.
2)Drain and place on a absorbed paper.
3)Garnish with onion rings, lemon wedge and coriander sprig.

name: Crispy Fish
ingredients: Fish fillet-500 gms,Salt-1/2 tsp,Black pepper-1/2 tsp,Flour batter:Plain flour- 4 tbsp,Corn flour-4 tbsp,Baking powder-1/2 tsp,Chilli sauce-2 tbsp,Salt-1/2 tsp,Red Chilli powder-1 tsp,Black pepper-1/2 tsp,Garlic powder-1/2 tsp,Vinegar-1 tbsp
recipe:
1)Take a fish, cut them in to slices and dry it with tissue.
2)Add salt, black pepper and mix it well.
3)Marinate for 15 mins,Liquid batter:In a bowl, add plain flour, corn flour,baking powder,chilli sauce,vinegar, salt, red chilli powder,black pepper, garlic powder and water as required & mix it well to make a liquid consistency paste.
4)Let it rest for 30 mins,Fish dip in plain flour, then dip in liquid batter, again coat it well in plain flour.
5)Deep fry in medium hot oil at medium flame until golden brown.
6)Must try out this Crispy and Crunchy Fried Fish,Enjoy!

name: Mint Fish
ingredients: Fish fillet 3 pcs (240 gms ),Salt 1/4 tsp,Red Chilli powder 1/4 tsp,Cumin seeds 1/4 tsp,Turmeric powder 1/4 tsp,Carom seeds 1/4 tsp,Mint 2 tbsp,Fresh coriander 2 tbsp,Green chilli 1 pc,Garlic clove3 pc,ginger 1pc,lemon juice 1tbsp
recipe:
1)In a Jug, add mint, fresh coriander, green chillies, salt, red chilli powder, garlic cloves, cumin seeds,carom seeds, ginger, turmeric powder,lemon juice.
2)Blend it well to make a thick paste.
3)Take a fish fillets, apply paste it well.Marinate for 15 mins.
4)Then fish coat it well in plain flour.
5)Fry on medium hot oil at medium flame for 4-5 mins until golden brown.
6)Crispy Mint Fish is ready to eat and served with ketchup.Enjoy!

name: Coconut burfi
ingredients: 3 cup coconut (grated),2 cup sugar,1 cup milk,2 tbsp cream (optional),1 tsp cardamom powder / elachi powder
recipe:
1)Firstly, take 3 cup freshly grated coconut into large kadai,add 2 cup sugar and 1  cup milk,mix well on medium flame until sugar dissolves completely
2)Keep stirring till the mixture starts to thicken. (takes approx. 10 minutes).
3)Now add 2 tbsp cream,continue to cook on medium flame stirring continuously,the mixture starts to thicken after 20 minutes,and after 25 minutes, coconut mixture will start to separate from pan,continue to cook until the mixture starts to hold the shape,now add 1  tsp cardamom powder and mix well.
4)Transfer the prepared dough into a greased plate lined with baking paper,set well forming a block,allow to set for 10 minute, or till it sets completely yet warm.
5)Now unmould and cut into pieces.
6)Finally, serve coconut burfi / nariyal barfi or store in airtight container for a week in refrigerator

name: Coconut Chocolate
ingredients: Desiccated coconut 1 cup,Condensed milk 1/3 cup,Chocolate 100gm
recipe:
1)Mix the coconut well
2)Make balls using the coconut
3)Boiling water, place the balls
4)Place a heat proof bowl
5)Melt the chocolate
6)Coat coconut balls with chocolate
7)Keep in the fridge for 10 mins
NOTE: 1 CUP = 250 ML

name: Coconut
ingredients: all the ingredients required to prepare chicken is present above
recipe: the ingredients are pu together to make this vegetable

name: Corn Soup
ingredients: For corn paste:1 cup sweet corn,2 tbsp water,For soup:3 tsp olive oil,2 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 inch ginger (finely chopped),4 tbsp spring onion (chopped),1 cup sweet corn,1 cup carrot (finely chopped),1 cup beans (finely chopped),3 cup water,1 tsp salt,1 tsp pepper,1 tsp vinegar,for corn flour slurry:1 tsp corn flour,cup corn flour
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tsp olive oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger,also, saute 2 tbsp spring onion slightly.
2)Now add 1  cup sweet corn, 1  cup carrot and 1  cup beans,saute for 2 minutes or until vegetables are slightly cooked.
3)Transfer the sweet corn paste and saute for 2 minutes,further add 3 cup water, 1 tsp salt and stir well,cover and boil for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are well cooked.
4)Now prepare a corn flour slurry by mixing 1 tsp corn flour in 1  cup water,mix to a lump free mixture.
5)Pour the corn flour slurry and stir well,stir and boil until the soup thickens,now add 1 tsp pepper,2 tsp vinegar and 2 tbsp spring onion.
6)Finally, enjoy sweet corn soup garnished with spring onions

name: Crispy Corn
ingredients: For boiling:4 cup water,1 tsp salt,2 cup sweet corn,for frying: cup corn flour,cup rice flour,1 tbsp maida / plain flour,tsp pepper powder,tsp salt,oil (for frying),for masala: tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1 tsp cumin powder,1 tsp aamchur,,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp onion (finely chopped),2 tbsp capsicum (finely chopped),2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large vessel boil 4 cup water and 1 tsp salt.
2)Add 2 cup sweet corn and boil for a minute.
3)Drain off the sweet corn to remove excess water.
4)Now add 1  cup cornflour, 1  cup rice flour, 1 tbsp maida, 1  tsp pepper powder and 1  tsp salt,mix well making sure the flour is coated well to sweet corn.
5)Sieve the mixture to remove excess flour,deep fry in hot oil making sure to keep the flame on medium,stir occasionally, and fry on medium flame until it turns golden brown.
6)Drain off over kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
7)Transfer the fried corn into a large bowl.
8)Add 1  tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp cumin powder, 1  tsp aamchur and 1  tsp salt.
9)Mix well making sure the spices are well combined,also add 2 tbsp onion, 2 tbsp capsicum and 2 tbsp coriander,mix well-combining everything well.
10)Finally, enjoy crispy corn recipe with tomato sauce.

name: Corn Chaat
ingredients: 3 Corn on cob,break in half,3 dry Red chillies,1 inch Ginger,4-5 Coriander roots,1 inch Cinnamon stick,1 Black Cardamom,1 tsp Black peppercorns,1 tsp Coriander seeds,Salt to taste,1 tsp Sugar,1 heaped tbsp Butter
recipe:
1)In a cooker add water, dry red chillies, ginger, coriander roots, cinnamon stick, black cardamom, black pepper cons, coriander seeds, salt to taste, sugar, butter and corn on cob and close the lid and give it 1-2 whistles and let it cool. 
2)Remove it and keep aside for future use.

name: Cheese Corn
ingredients: 1/2 Cup Corn Boiled,1/2 Cup Cheese,1/2 Capsicum,1 Tbsp. Cornflour,2 Tbsp. Maida + Water,2 Slices Of Bread Crumbs,1 Potato, Boiled3/4 Tsp. Red Chilli Flakes,Pinch Of Pepper,1 Tsp. Oregano,1/8 Tsp. Garlic Paste
recipe:
1)To make the corn & cheese mixture:In a bowl, add the grated cheese, boiled and mashed potato, boiled yellow corn, green capsicum, coriander leaves, red chilli flakes, crushed oregano, little pepper, garlic paste, cornflour and salt and mix everything well.
2)Apply little oil on your palms and start making little 1/2 inch balls from the mixture.
3)To make the flour batter:In a bowl, add the all purpose flour and water and mix them till you get a pouring consistency batter.
4)To make the fried balls:On your work surface, put some plain flour and bread crumbs.
5)Roll the cheese balls in the plain flour, dip them in the plain flour batter and then roll them in the bread crumbs.
6)Deep fry the well coated cheese balls just before you serve them

name: Potato Corn
ingredients: Refined flour 1  cup,Salt 1 tsp,Water as required,Oil 1 tsp,Oil 1 tbsp,Onions 1 medium size (chopped),Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp,Green chillies 1 tbsp (chopped),Capsicum 1 medium size (chopped),Ketchup 2 tbsp,Red chilly sauce 1 tbsp,Red chilly powder 1 tbsp,Coriander powder 1 tbsp,Turmeric powder 1 tsp,Aamchur powder 1 tsp,Garam masala 1 tsp,Potatoes 3-4 medium size (boiled & mashed),Sweet corn 1 cup,Salt to taste,Fresh coriander 2 tbsp,Butter,Half cooked frankie roti,Aloo corn Filling,Chopped onions,Frankie masala,Chilly vinegar,Processed cheese
recipe:
1)In a mixing bowl add the refined flour and salt, mix well and add water to knead a soft and a stretchy dough.
2)Incorporate the oil and knead the dough to get more smooth texture.
3)Apply oil to prevent the dough surface from drying.
4)Cover it with a damp cloth and rest it for 1  an hour.
5)Knead the dough once again and shape it into roundels.
6)Flatten the dough balls for making chapattis.
7)Half Cook the chapatti until brown spots appear. You can keep half cooked chapatti according to your consumption.
8)Heat oil in a wok, add onions, ginger garlic paste and green chillies, saut‚ until onions are translucent.
9)Add chopped capsicum, ketchup, reed chilly sauce and powdered spices, cook for 1  a minute.
10)Add the boiled & mashed potatoes, sweet corn and salt to taste, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.
11)Add freshly chopped coriander leaves and mix well.
12)Cook the half-cooked Frankie rotis by applying butter on both the sides before serving.
13)Apply the hot aloo corn filling on the cooked roti,Add some chopped onions, sprinkle some Frankie masala and chilly vinegar.
14)Grate some processed cheese, roll the roti and your good to go.

name: Cauliflower Corn
ingredients: 500 gms Cauliflower/Gobhi,1 cup corn,,2 tomatoes ( to be pureed),1 large onion,,small piece of ginger and 4-5 cloves,4-5 tbsp grated coconut ( or dried shredded coconut unsweetened),2 tbsp sesame seeds,,5-6 cashews,1 cinnamon stick,3-4 cloves,1 tsp cumin seeds,1 tsp crushed coriander seeds,1 tsp poppey seeds,Salt per taste,1-2 tsp red chilli powder,1 tsp turmeric,2 green cardamom,1/2 tsp dried fenugreek leaves,oil for cooking,Cilantro for garnish
recipe:
1)Puree tomatoes and set them aside.
2) Steam cauliflower.
 3) Make Korma paste by frying cumin, coriander, poppey seeds with onions, ginger, garlic, cardamom, sesame seeds, cashews and coconut and then grinding the mixture with a little bit of water. 
4)Next fry cinnamon and cloves in oil. Add tomato puree. Add salt, turmeric and chilli powder. Let tomatoes cook.
5) After few mins, add corn. Mix well. Add korma paste. Add cauliflower.
6) Mix in cauliflower well with other ingredients. Let it simmer for few mins. Finish off with fenugreek leaves and cilantro.

name: Watermelon Juice
ingredients: 2 cup watermelon (cubes),2 tbsp mint / pudina,2 tbsp lemon juice,1 tsp pepper powder,1 tbsp sugar
recipe:
1)Wirstly, in a blender take 2 cup watermelon, 2 tbsp mint, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1  tsp pepper powder and 1 tbsp sugar.
2)Blend well and enjoy fresh watermelon juice garnished with mint.

name: Grape Juice
ingredients: Few ice cubes,1 cup grape syrup (prepared),few grapes (chopped),1 cup water
recipe:
1)Extract the grape juice.
2)Squeeze well to get enough pulp from the grape mixture.
3)Transfer the extracted grape juice to the large vessel.also add 1  cup sugar and mix well.boil the syrup for 2 minutes.and further turn off the flame and squeeze lemon juice.
4)Cool completely before storing the grape syrup.once cooled, transfer to the large glass jar and can store in refrigerator for atleast 6 months.
5)To prepare the grape juice, take ice cubes in glass jar.
6)Add in 1  cup prepared grape syrup.also add 1 cup of water and add few chopped fresh grapes.
7)Mix well, adjust the concentration depending on your choice.
8)Finally, serve grape juice chilled garnished with a mint leaves.

name: Orange Juice
ingredients: 4 oranges,peeled and ,chopped 3/4 cup water
recipe:
1)Combine the peeled and chopped oranges and the water into the base of a high-speed blender, like a Vitamix. 
2)Blend on high for about 15-20 seconds, or until the juice is smooth. 
3)Serve immediately.

name: Kokam Juice
ingredients: 1 cup 200 grams kokum / bhirand / muragalu / punarpuli / kaatampi dry / fresh,2 cup water,2 cup sugar,1 tsp cumin powder / jeera powder,1 tsp pepper (crushed),pinch of salt
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl soak 11  cup kokum in 2 cups of hot water for 3 hours.
2)Transfer to a blender and blend to coarse paste.take the kokum paste to kadai.
3)Add 2 cup sugar and 1  cup water.mix well-dissolving sugar completely.
4)Further, add boil for 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally.
5)Boil until the mixture thickens and forms syrup consistency.
6)Turn off the flame and add 1  tsp cumin powder, 1  tsp crushed pepper and pinch of salt.
7)Mix well and pass the mixture through a sieve.make sure to squeeze of the pulp completely.
8)Now kokum syrup is ready. refrigerate it and use as required. kokum syrup stays good for 2-3 months when refrigerated.
9)To make kokum juice from kokum concentration, take few ice cubes in a glass.
10)Pour 2 tbsp of prepared kokum syrup / kokum concentration.pour 2 cups of cold water and mix well.
11)Finally, serve kokum juice / kokum sharbat chilled garnished with mint leaves.

name: Lime Juice
ingredients: 7 ice cubes,1 inch ginger (crushed),5 mint / pudina leaves (roughly chopped),1 tbsp powdered sugar,lemon juice,salt to taste,1 tsp pepper (crushed),1 slice lemon,1 glass cold water
recipe:
1)Firstly, take 7 ice cubes in a jar.further add 1 inch crushed ginger and 5 chopped mint / pudina leaves.also add in 1 tbsp powdered sugar.squeeze in 1  lemon juice.
2)Add salt to taste, 1  tsp crushed pepper and 1 slice lemon.
3)Pour in 1 glass cold water and mix well.
4)Finally mix well and ginger-mint lemon sharbat is ready to serve.

name: Mint Juice
ingredients: Lemon 2nos,Sugar 2tbsp,Mint leaves 1 cup,Ice Cubes Few,Water 1 cups
recipe:
1)Cut and squeeze the lemons in a blender jar, add sugar, ice cubes, mint and water. 
2)Blend it till completely smooth. 
3)Remove strain and serve chilled.

name: Hakka Noodles
ingredients: 2 tbsp oil,2 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 chilli (slit),2 inch ginger (chopped),2 tbsp spring onion (chopped),1 onion (sliced),2 capsicum (sliced),2 cabbage (shredded),1 carrot (sliced),2 beans (chopped),2 tbsp chilli sauce,2 tbsp soy sauce,2 tbsp tomato sauce,1 tsp salt,1 tsp pepper powder,2 tbsp vinegar,few bean sprouts
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large vessel take 8 cup water, 2 tbsp oil, 1 tsp salt.
2)Once the water comes to a boil, add 2 pack noodles.
3)Stir and boil for 3 minutes or until the noodles turn al dente. 
4)Refer package instructions to know the cooking time.
5)Drain off the noodles and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking process. keep aside.
6)In a large wok heat 2 tbsp oil and add 2 clove garlic, 1 chilli, 2 inch ginger and 2 tbsp spring onion.
7)Stir fry on high flame.now add 1  onion, 1  capsicum, 1  cabbage, 1 carrot, 2 beans.
