8)Stir fry until the vegetables shrink slightly.further add 2 tbsp chilli sauce, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1  tsp salt and 1  tsp pepper powder.
9)Stir fry until the sauces well combine.now add boiled noodles, 2 tbsp vinegar and stir fry.
10)Also add few bean sprouts and 2 tbsp spring onions. stir fry.
11)Finally, enjoy veg hakka noodles garnished with more spring onions.

name: Garlic Noodles
ingredients: 2 litre water (for boiling pasta),1 tbsp salt,300 grams spaghetti pasta,2 tbsp olive oil,2 tbsp butter,5 clove garlic (chopped),1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp mixed herbs,3 tbsp cheese (grated)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large vessel take 2 litre water, 1 tbsp salt.once the water comes to a boil, add 300 grams spaghetti pasta.
2)Mix well making sure the pasta is completely immersed in water.
3)Boil for 8 minutes or until the pasta is al dente. 
4)Refer package instruction to know the cooking time.
5)Drain off the water and keep aside. reserve the pasta boiled water, we will use it later.
6)Now in a large wok, take 2 tbsp olive oil and 2 tbsp butter.add 5 clove garlic and saute slightly.
7)Also, add 1 tsp chilli flakes and saute until the flavours are absorbed well.
8)Now add 1  cup pasta boiled water and mix well. adding pasta boiled water gives nice saucy texture due to starch.
9)Once the water comes to a boil, add boiled pasta and mix gently.
10)Also, add 1 tsp mixed herbs and 1  tsp chilli flakes. 
11)Give a good mix.
12)Now add 3 tbsp cheese and give a final mix. you can use parmesan cheese or cheddar cheese here.
13)Finally, enjoy chilli butter garlic pasta recipe with more cheese.

name: Schezwan Noodles
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,3 clove garlic (finely chopped),4 tbsp spring onion (chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),2 carrot (chopped),4 tbsp cabbage (shredded),4 beans (chopped),1 capsicum (chopped),2 tbsp schezwan sauce,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp olive oil and saute 3 clove garlic and 2 tbsp spring onion.also, saute 1  onion on high flame.
2)Further add 1  carrot, 4 tbsp cabbage, 4 beans and 1  capsicum.
3)Stir fry on high flame without overcooking vegetables.
4)Now add 2 tbsp schezwan sauce and 1  tsp salt. you can also use homemade schezwan sauce or schezwan chutney.
5)Stir fry for a minute making sure sauce is well combined.
6)Furthermore, add in cooked noodles and stir fry on high flame.
7)Mix until the sauce is well combined.finally, add spring onions and enjoy schezwan noodles.

name: Veg Noodles
ingredients: 2 tbsp oil,2 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 inch ginger (finely chopped),1 chilli (slit),1 onion (sliced),2 tbsp spring onion (chopped),2 carrot (chopped),3 green capsicum (chopped),5 snow pea (chopped),5 beans (chopped),2 red capsicum (chopped),5 florets broccoli,3 tbsp cabbage (shredded),2 tbsp tomato sauce,1 tbsp soy sauce,1 tbsp vinegar,1 tbsp chilli sauce,1 tsp pepper powder,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large vessel take 6 cup water, 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp oil.
2)Once the water comes to a boil place a pack of hakka noodles (125 gm)boil the noodles for 3 minutes or till it turns al dente. 
3)Refer package instructions to know the exact cooking time.
4)Drain off the water from noodles and pour 1 cup of cold water to prevent from further cooking.
5)Drizzle 1 tsp oil and mix gently, to avoid noodles from sticking to each other. keep aside.
6)Now in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 1 chilli.saute 1  onion, 2 tbsp spring onion on high flame.
7)Further add 1  carrot, 1  green capsicum, 5 snow pea, 5 beans, chopped, 1  red capsicum and 5 florets broccoli.
8)Stir fry on high flame for 2 minutes or until veggies are cooked yet retain their crunch.
9)Also add 3 tbsp cabbage and stir fry.
10)Further add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp chilli sauce, 1  tsp pepper powder and 1  tsp salt.
11)Stir fry until sauces are well combined.add in boiled noodles and mix gently.
12)Toss and mix until noodles are cooked completely.
13)Finally, garnish with spring onion and enjoy veg noodles.

name: Masala Noodles
ingredients: 2 tbsp oil,2 inch ginger (julienne),3 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 chilli (slit),2 tbsp spring onion (chopped),1 onion (sliced),1 carrot (julienne),1 cup cabbage (shredded),5 beans (chopped),2 capsicum (thinly sliced),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp cumin powder,0.5 tsp garam masala,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp tomato sauce,2 tbsp vinegar,2 tbsp soy sauce,1 tsp black pepper powder
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large wok, heat 2 tbsp oil, saute 2 inch ginger, 3 clove garlic, 1 chilli and 2 tbsp spring onion.now add 1  onion and stir fry on high flame.
2)Add 1 carrot, 1 cup cabbage, 5 beans and 1  capsicum.
3)Stir fry on high flame until the vegetables are cooked yet remain crunchy.
4)Now ad 1  tsp turmeric, ? tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp cumin powder, 1  tsp garam masala and 1  tsp salt.
5)Saute until the spices turn aromatic.further add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 2 tbsp vinegar, 2 tbsp soy sauce and 1  tsp black pepper powder.
6)Stir fry until the sauces are well combined.add in boiled noodles and mix well making sure everything is well combined.
7)Finally, add 2 tbsp spring onions and enjoy masala noodles.

name: Cabbage Noodles
ingredients: 2 cups of shredded cabbage,1 instant ramen noodle,A few thin slices of pork ,2 table spoons of oyster sauce,1 clove of garlic,Olive oil,Salt & Pepper,1 stalk of green onion (optional),White sesame (optional
recipe:
1) Shred cabbage.
2) Cut pork into small pieces
3) Slice green onion diagonally
4) Prepare instant ramen noodle. Add the noodle and pour 2 cups of water in a microwave safe container. Cook in microwave for 6 minutes.
5) Strain the noodle when cooked. You can drizzle a little bit of olive oil and mix it with the noodles so that they won't stick each other.
6) Heat olive oil in a pan.
7) Add crushed garlic.
8) Add shredded cabbage.
9) Add pork.
10) When the cabbage becomes slightly wilted, add 2 table spoons of oyster sauce.
11) Continue cooking until pork is fully cooked.
12) Add ramen noodles.
13) Season with salt and pepper.
14) Serve the noodle. Sprinkle white sesame and garnish green onion slices.
15) Enjoy!

name: Pink  Pasta
ingredients: For boiling pasta:1 litre water,1 tsp salt,2 tsp olive oil,2 cup penne pasta,For white pasta sauce:1 tsp butter,2 tsp olive oil,2 tbsp maida,1 cup milk (chilled),1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp salt,3 tbsp cheese (grated),For red pasta sauce:3 tsp olive oil,1 tsp butter,3 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 onion (finely chopped),1 cup tomato puree,2 tbsp tomato sauce,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp salt,Other ingredients:3 tbsp cheese (grated),1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp mixed herbs
recipe:
How to make white pasta sauce:
1)Firstly, in a pan heat 1 tsp butter, 2 tsp olive oil and 2 tbsp maida.roast on low flame until the maida turns aromatic.
2)Now add 11  cup milk and stir continuously. make sure the milk is chilled, else you may have lumps in the sauce.keep stirring until the sauce thickens up slightly.
3)Now add 1  tsp mixed herbs, 1  tsp chilli flakes, 1  tsp salt and 3 tbsp cheese.give a good mix. white sauce for pasta is ready. do not overcook as the sauce thickens and turns to paste consistency.
How to make red sauce for pasta:
10Firstly, in a large wok heat 3 tsp olive oil, 1 tsp butter, 3 clove garlic, 1  tsp mixed herbs and 1  tsp chilli flakes.
2)Saute on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.now add 1 onion and saute until the onions sweat slightly.
3)Further, add 11  cup tomato puree and cook on medium flame until the puree thickens slightly.
4)Also add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1  tsp chilli powder and 1  tsp salt.
5)Continue to cook until the sauce thickens. red sauce is ready for the pasta.
6)How to make pink sauce for pasta:now combine prepared white sauce with the red sauce. 
7)Add as required, as this white sauce makes the pasta creamy.
8)Now you can see the colour of the pasta sauce has been changed to pink. 
9)Pink sauce is ready to prepare pasta.add in boiled pasta and give a good mix.
10)The pasta is so creamy and saucy.you can also add 3 tbsp cheese, 1  tsp chilli flakes and 1  tsp mixed herbs.
11)Mix well combining everything well.finally, enjoy pink sauce pasta with more cheese.

name: White Pasta
ingredients: For sauteeing vegetables:2 tbsp oil,3 clove garlic (finely chopped),2 onion (chopped),1 carrot (chopped),2 capsicum (chopped),3 tbsp sweet corn,1 tsp pepper (crushed),1 tsp salt,For white pasta sauce:2 tbsp butter,3 tbsp maida / plain flour,2 cup milk,1 tsp pepper (crushed),1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp salt, cheese (for garnishing)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai boil 6 cup water and 1 tsp salt.
2)Once the water comes to a boil, add 2 cup pasta.
3)I have used elicoidali pasta, you can alternatively use penne pasta.
4)Boil for 7 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked al dente.
5)Drain off the pasta and keep aside.in a frying pan, heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 3 clove garlic.
6)Add 1  onion, 1  carrot, 1  capsicum and 3 tbsp sweet corn.
7)Saute for a minute or until vegetables shrink slightly yet remain crunchy.
8)Further, add 1  tsp pepper and 1  tsp salt.saute well until the spices are well combined. keep aside.
9)To prepare white sauce for pasta, heat 2 tbsp butter.
10)Add 3 tbsp maida and saute on low flame.
11)Saute until the maida turns aromatic yet do not change its colour.
12)Now add 1 cup milk and mix well.mix until the sauce thickens without forming any lumps.
13)Further, add 1 more cup of milk and continue to stir continuously.
14)Mix continuously, until the sauce thickens. 
15)If required using a whisk break the lumps.cook until the sauce turns silk smooth and creamy texture.
16)Now add 1  tspepper, 1  tsp chilli flakes, 1  tsp mixed herbs and 1  tsp salt.
17)Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
18)Add in sauted vegetables and combine well.now add in boiled pasta and mix gently.
19)Add 2 tbsp of boiled pasta water if the sauce thickens.
20)Mix gently making sure everything is well combined.
21)Finally, just before serving white sauce pasta, garnish with grated cheese.

name: Pasta Mayonnaise
ingredients: 3 tsp oil,2 clove garlic (finely chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),2 carrot (finely chopped),2 tbsp sweet corn,3 capsicum (finely chopped),2 tsp pepper (crushed),1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp salt,1 cup mayonnaise (eggless)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large vessel boil 6 cup water along with 1  tsp salt.
2)Now add 2 cup penne pasta and stir well.
3)Boil for 10 minutes or until the pasta turns al dente. 
4)Befer package instructions for cooking time.
5)Drain off the cooked pasta and pour 1 cup cold water to stop the cooking process.
6)Now in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic.
7)Also saute 1  onion until they shrink slightly.
8)Further add 1  carrot, 2 tbsp sweet corn and 1  capsicum.
9)Stir fry for 2 minutes without over cooking vegetables.
10)Now add 1  tsp pepper, 1 tsp mixed herbs, 1  tsp chilli flakes and 1  tsp salt. 
11)Give a good mix.additionally, add 1  cup water leftover pasta water.
12)Also add 1  cup eggless mayonnaise. add more if you are looking for more creamy pasta.now stir and combine keeping the flame on low. 
13)Do not get sauce to boil.Furthermore add boiled pasta and mix well coating sauce uniformly.
14)Finally, enjoy mayo pasta / mayonnaise pasta topped with cheese and chilli flakes.

name: Pasta Cauliflower
ingredients: 1 small head of cauliflower, cut into 1 inch pieces,2 cups dried pasta,cooked and drained,1 cup panko breadcrumbs,4 cloves garlic, minced,1 cup grated parmesan cheese,2 oz cream cheese,1 cup pasta water,1 tablespoon butter,Zest from whole lemon,Juice from whole lemon
recipe:
1)Cook preferred pasta according to the package's direction, drain and save some of the pasta water. 
2) Set aside. In a large pan, add olive oil and let it get hot. 
3)Add 1 clove garlic garlic and panko bread crumb. 
4)Toast it all until lightly browned. 
5)Remove and set aside.
6) In the same pan, drizzle more olive oil and add the cauliflower with a bit of salt.
7) Pan roast it for about 8 minutes until its softened slightly and golden brown.
8) Next, add the rest of the garlic, butter, and saute until fragrant. 
9)Add cream cheese, pasta water, lemon zest, lemon juice to create the sauce. 
10)Stir in the cooked pasta and coat it in the sauce.
11) To serve, add the pasta and cauliflower, top with the garlic bread crumbs, parsley, and a hint of chili flakes. Enjoy!

name: Pasta Soup
ingredients: 3 tsp olive oil,1 inch ginger (finely chopped),3 clove garlic (sliced),2 tbsp coriander,2 onion (finely chopped),1 carrot (chopped),1 red capsicum (chopped),5 beans (chopped),2 tbsp sweet corn,1 tsp pepper powder,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp salt,4 cup water,1 cup pasta (bowtie),10 cherry tomato,2 tbsp spring onion (chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large wok heat 3 tsp olive oil. saute 1 inch ginger, 3 clove garlic and 2 tbsp coriander.
2)Now add 1  onion and saute slightly.further, add 1  carrot, 1  red capsicum, 5 beans and 2 tbsp sweet corn.
3)Stir fry on high flame keeping the vegetables crunchy.now add 1  tsp pepper powder, 1  tsp chilli flakes, 1  tsp mixed herbs and 1  tsp salt.
4)Stir fry for a minute until the spices turn aromatic.
5)Pour 4 cup water and get the water to a rolling boil.
6)Add in 1 cup pasta, 10 cherry tomato. i have used bowtie pasta, you can use the shape of your choice.
7)Boil for 10 minutes or until the pasta is cooked yet al dente.
8)Finally, add 2 tbsp spring onion enjoy pasta soup piping hot.

name: Pasta Masala
ingredients: 1 cup penne pasta (or any pasta),water to boil,1 tsp salt,Other ingredients:1 tsp oil,1 tsp butter,2 clove garlic (finely chopped),1 inch ginger (finely chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),1 cup tomato pulp,1 tsp turmeric / haldi,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,2 tbsp tomato sauce,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp corn,2capsicum(finely chopped),2 carrot (finely chopped),2 tbsp peas / matar7 florets broccoli,3 tbsp water,1 tsp mixed herbs (basil, marjoram, oregano, rosemary, sage, thyme)
recipe:
1)Firstly, saute 1 inch ginger and 2 clove garlic in 1 tsp oil and 1 tsp butter.
2)Further saute 1  onion till they turn soft.
3)Additionally add 1 cup tomato pulp and saute well.
4)Keep stirring till the tomato pulp thickens.now add 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp garam masala and 1  tsp salt.
5)Saute till the spices gets cooked completely.
6)Now add 2 tbsp corn, 1  capsicum, 1  carrot, 2 tbsp peas and 7 florets broccoli. 
7)Saute for a minute.add in 3 tbsp water and mix well.
8)Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.now add in 2 tbsp tomato sauce and 1  tsp mixed herbs. mix well.
9)Add in cooked pasta and mix gently till the sauce gets coated well.
10)Finally, serve masala pasta indian style hot topped with cheese if required

name: Club Sandwich
ingredients: 2 tsp oil,2 onion (finely chopped),1 carrot (finely chopped),2 capsicum (finely chopped),3 tbsp sweet corn? cup paneer / cottage cheese (grated),1 tsp pepper powder,1 tsp salt,1 tsp mixed herbs,2 tbsp tomato sauce,for sandwich3 slices bread (white or brown),butter (for toasting),2 tsp green chutney,1 aloo / potato (boiled),1 tomato (slice),1 onion (slice),pepper powder (for sprinkling),salt (for sprinkling),mixed herbs (for sprinkling),1 slice cheese,1 tsp tomato sauce
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a pan heat 2 tsp oil and add 1  onion, 1 carrot, 1  capsicum and 3 tbsp sweet corn.
2)Saute for 2 minutes without overcooking vegetables.
3)Now add ? cup paneer, 1  tsp pepper powder, 1  tsp salt and 1  tsp mixed herbs.
4)Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
5)Further, add 2 tbsp tomato sauce and mix well.paneer mixture is ready, keep aside.
6)Spread butter to bread and toast to a golden brown.toast the bread on both sides.
7)On one slice of bread, spread 1 tsp green chutney.
8)Spread 2 tbsp of prepared paneer mixture.
9)Place another slice of bread and spread 1 tsp green chutney.
10)Top with boiled potato slices, tomato slices and onion slices.
11)Further sprinkle pepper powder, salt, and mixed herbs.
12)Place a slice of cheese and spread 1 tsp tomato sauce.
13)Cover with toasted bread and press gently.
14)Prick with a toothpick making sure all the layers are intact.
15)Cut into 4 pieces or shape of your choice.
16)Finally, enjoy club sandwich with chips.

name: Chocolate Sandwich
ingredients: 150 grams chocolate,2 slice bread (white or brown),2 tsp cashew / kaju (chopped),2 tsp pistachios (chopped),2 tsp almonds / badam (chopped),2 tsp raisins / kishmish,1 slice mozzarella cheese,1 tsp butter
recipe:
1)Firstly, chop chocolate into small pieces.
2)You can alternatively use chocolate sauce.
3)Spread 3 tbsp of chocolate pieces over bread slice.
4)Top with 1 tsp cashew, 1 tsp pistachios, 1 tsp almonds and 1 tsp raisins.
5)Place a cheese slice over it.again top with 1 tsp cashew, 1 tsp pistachios, 1 tsp almonds and 1 tsp raisins.
6)Further, cover with a bread slice and press gently.
7)Spread butter over bread and grill golden.
8)Finally, cut half and enjoy chocolate sandwich recipe.

name: Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 1 carrot (grated),2 tbsp cabbage (shredded),2 tbsp capsicum (finely chopped),2 tomato (finely chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp pepper powder,1 tsp salt,1 cup eggless mayonnaise,3 slice bread (white or brown),1 tsp butter,3 tsp green chutney,2 tsp tomato sauce,1 cup cheddar cheese (grated)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a bowl take 1  carrot, 2 tbsp cabbage, 2 tbsp capsicum, 1  tomato and 1  onion.
2)Also, add 1  tsp pepper powder and 1  tsp salt.further, add 1  cup eggless mayonnaise and mix well.
3)Now take 2 slice bread and spread butter.also spread 1 tsp green chutney on both sides of bread.
4)Now top with prepared mayonnaise stuffing and add tomato sauce.
5)Prepare a double layer sandwich by placing the layer one above the other.
6)Cover with a slice of bread. make sure to spread butter and green chutney on the bread slice.
7)Grill to golden brown or toast on tawa applying butter on both sides.
8)Cut the sandwich to half and top with grated cheese.
9)Finally, enjoy mayonnaise cheese sandwich along with tea.

name: Veg Sandwich
ingredients: 3 carrot (grated),3 tbsp cabbage (shredded),3 capsicum (finely chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),3 tbsp sweet corn,2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped),1 cup cream / malai,1 tsp pepper powder,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp mixed herbs,8 slice bread (white or brown)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 1  carrot, 3 tbsp cabbage, 1  capsicum, 1  onion, 3 tbsp sweet corn and 2 tbsp coriander.
2)Add 1  cup cream, 1  tsp pepper powder, 1  tsp chilli flakes and 1  tsp mixed herbs.
3)Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
4)Now take a bread slice and spread 2 tbsp of prepared vegetable malai mixture.
5)Cover with another bread slice and press gently.
6)Trim off the sides. you can keep the sides if you prefer.
7)Finally, enjoy malai sandwich with tomato sauce.

name: Spinach Corn Sandwich
ingredients: 1 tsp butter,2 tbsp onion (finely chopped),1 cup palak / spinach (finely chopped),1 cup corn,1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp pepper (crushed),1 tsp salt,4 slice bread (white / brown),4 tsp green chutney,butter for toasting
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large tawa heat 1 tsp butter and saute 2 tbsp onion.
2)Also, add 1 cup palak and saute for 2 minutes or until palak shrinks.
3)Now add 1  cup corn and saute until corn is cooked well.
4)Further add 1  tsp mixed herbs, 1  tsp chilli flakes, 1  tsp pepper and 1  tsp salt.
5)Saute and mix well. 
6)The mixture is ready, keep aside.
7)Now take 2 slices of bread and spread 1 tsp green chutney on each slice of bread.
8)Spread 2 tbsp of prepared palak corn mixture over bread slice.
9)Further place a slice of cheese.cover with another slice of bread and press gently.
10)Roast the sandwich with butter on both sides.
11)Finally, cut the bread in half and serve spinach corn sandwich.

name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: 1 cup (260 gm) sugar,1 cup oil,1 cup buttermilk,1 tsp vanilla extract,2 cup (300 gm) maida / plain flour,1 cup (60 gm) cocoa powder,1 tsp baking powder,1 tsp baking soda,1 tsp salt,1 tsp coffee powder,1 cup water,For frosting:2 cup heavy cream / whipping cream,1 cup icing sugar,1 cup cocoa powder,1 tsp vanilla extract
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 11  cup sugar, 1 cup oil, 1  cup buttermilk and 1 tsp vanilla extract.
2)Whisk and mix well until sugar melts completely.place a sieve and add 2 cup maida, 1  cup cocoa powder, 1 tsp baking powder, 1  tsp baking soda, 1  tsp salt and 1 tsp coffee powder.
3)Sieve the flour making sure there are no lumps.
4)Now using cut and fold method, mix the batter.
5)Add 1  cup water or as required and prepare a smooth consistency batter.
6)To prepare the cake in a pressure cooker add in 2 cup of salt and close the lid of cooker without keeping the gasket and whistle. 
7)Heat for 5 to 10 minutes. as a result, gives a preheat oven atmosphere.now transfer the cake batter to a cake mould (dia: 7 inch, height: 4 inch). 
8)Make sure to line a butter paper at the bottom to prevent from sticking.and also tap twice to level up uniformly and remove any air bubbles if present.
9)Place the cake pan into preheated cooker.cover and cook on a medium flame for 45 minutes. 
10)You can alternatively, preheat and bake at 180- degree  celsius for 45 minutes.
11)Insert a toothpick and check if the cake has baked completely.
12)Cool the cake and then unmould the chocolate cake.
Chocolate frosting:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 2 cup heavy cream. 
2)You can use whipping cream or any cream with 35% milkfat.
3)Now add 1 cup icing sugar, 1  cup cocoa powder and 1 tsp vanilla extract.
4)Beat on low speed until stiff peaks appear.
5)Chocolate frosting is ready. 
6)Keep it refrigerated until you use.

name: Chocolate Cookie
ingredients: For cookie dough:100 grams butter (room temperature),1 cup (100 gm) powdered sugar,1 tsp vanilla extract,1 (200 gm) maida
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 100 grams butter, 1 cup powdered sugar and 1 tsp vanilla extract.beat on low speed until everything is well combined.
2)Continue to beat sugar and mixture until it turns whitish and silky smooth.
3)Place a sieve and add 11  maida, 1  cup cocoa powder, 1  tsp baking powder and pinch salt.
4)Sieve the flour making sure there are no lumps.now with the help of spatula mix the flour gently.
5)Crumble and mix until the flour is well combined with butter mixture.
6)Add 2 tbsp milk or as required if the mixture is dry.
7)Bring together and form a dough without kneading. 
8)Form a soft dough making sure not to knead.to prepare cookie in a pressure cooker add in 11  cup of salt and place a small cup or cooker rack. 
9)Also, place a plate above it.close the lid of cooker without keeping the gasket and whistle. 
10)Heat for 5 to 10 minutes. as a result, gives a preheat oven atmosphere.
11)Now pinch a ball sized dough and flatten slightly.
12)Place the cookie dough over the plate giving good space in between.
13)Now cover and cook on medium flame for 17 minutes. 
14)You can alternatively, preheat and bake at 180- degree  celsius for 15 minutes.
15)The cookie will be soft initially. cool completely and the chocolate cookie turns crisp and crunchy.
16)Finally, store the chocolate cookies in an airtight container and enjoy for a week.

name: Chocolate Doughnut
ingredients: 4 Cups All-purpose Flour,2 Eggs,1 Cup Milk,2 Tsp Yeast,1/4 Tsp Salt,1/2 Tsp Vanilla Extract,1/3 Cup Sugar,1/4 Cup (50g) Unsalted Butter,Vegetable Oil,Dark Chocolate (3 oz),Shredded Coconut, Walnuts, Chocolate
recipe:
1)Heat the milk to 105 to 115 degree F (40 degree to 46 degree C).
2)Heat the unsalted butter until it's melted.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Whisk eggs until fluffy in a large bowl.
2)Add milk, yeast, Salt, vanilla extract and sugar, continue whisking.
3)Pour the melted butter into the bowl, stir until well mixed.
4)Add the flour gradually while stirring.
5)Knead the batter for 10 minutes or more on a floured surface.
6)Put the batter back into the bowl, cover the bowl with a plastic back or a lid.
7)Let the batter rise for about an hour or until it doubles in size.
8)Roll out the batter with a rolling pin until an inch thick.
9)Cut the dough with a round cookie cutter and use a smaller cookie cutter and cut out the center.
10)Place the donuts onto a baking pan and allow to rest for 20 more minutes.
11)Deep fry the donuts in vegetable.
12)Remove the donuts using a strainer spoon and place them on a napkin to rid of excessive oil.
13)While donuts are cooling down, melt a 3 oz (85g) chocolate bar in a microwave.
14)Dip the donuts (top) into the melted chocolate and place it on a topping of your choice (chocolate, walnuts or coconut).

name: Chocolate Biscuit
ingredients: 2 Cups All-Purpose Flour,2 Eggs,8 oz (227g) Unsalted Butter,2 Cups Pastry Cream,1/2 Cup Sugar,3/4 Tsp Baking Powder,1/2 Tsp Baking Soda,1 Tsp Dark Cocoa Powder,1/4 Tsp Vanilla Extract
recipe:
Preparations:
1)Prepare the pastry cream.
Directions:
1)Melt the butter and pour into a large bowl.
2)Stir in the sugar.
3)Add in eggs and whisk until fluffy.
4)Stir in vanilla extract.
5)In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and baking soda.
6)Gradually stir in the flour to the butter mixture while whisking.
7)Continue folding the batter until well mixed.
8)Cover a cookie pan with parchment paper.
9)Spread the batter over the cookie pan evenly.
10)Preheat oven to 300 degree F (149¦ C), Bake the biscuit for 10 minutes.
11)Remove from oven and set aside to cool down.
12)Combine pastry cream with cocoa powder.
13)Cut the edges of the biscuit.
14)Cut the biscuit in half.
15)Spread 1/3 of the cream over one half of the biscuit evenly.
16)Place the other half over the cream and cover the whole pastry with the remaining of the cream.
17)Scatter the biscuit edges that you had cut earlier over the whole biscuit to cover all over.

name: Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,1 onion (thinly sliced),2 clove garlic,2 cup 400gm pumpkin, sliced,1 tsp salt,1 tsp pepper (crushed),2 cup water,cream to garnish
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp olive oil. 
2)Alternatively use any neutral flavoured oil or butter.
3)Further saute 1 thinly sliced onions till it shrinks.
4)Also saute 2 clove garlic.
5)Now add 2 cup (400gm) sliced pumpkin. 
6)Use any pumpkin of your choice.also add 1  tsp salt and 1  tsp pepper.
7)Saute for a minute or 2 till it changes colour slightly.
8)Furthermore add 2 cup water and mix well.cover and boil for 15 minutes on medium flame.
9)Cook the pumpkin well and allow to cool lightly.transfer to the blender and blend to smooth paste.
10)Pour the prepared pumpkin soup into bowl and garnish with a tbsp of cream. 
11)Alternatively use greek yogurt if you are diet conscious.
12)Finally, serve pumpkin soup sprinkled with black pepper or store in refrigerator for a week and enjoy when required.

name: Mushroom Soup
ingredients: 2 tsp olive oil / any cooking oil,1 tbsp unsalted butter,2 tbsp onion (finely chopped),2 cloves garlic / lasun (finely chopped),10 mushrooms (thinly sliced),1 tsp maida/ plain flour / refined flour / all-purpose flour,3 cups veg stock / water,1 tsp pepper (crushed),few thyme herbs (optional),salt to taste,1 cup cream / malai (fresh)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large kadai heat oil and butter.
2)Further add onions and garlic.saute for a minute or till they just sweat.
3)Further add sliced mushrooms. 
4)Add variety of mushrooms if you prefer.
5)Also saute for a minute and simmer for 5 minutes.
6)Saute and cook the mushrooms till they shrink in size slightly.
7)Additionally add maida and saute for a minute or till the raw smell disappears. 
8)Maida helps to thicken soup.furthermore add water or veg stock.
9)Also add crushed pepper, thyme and salt to taste.
10)Mix well and boil for 5 minutes.further transfer 1 cup of mushroom + water into the blender. 
11)You can also puree entire mixture.cool and blend smooth. 
12)This helps to give creamy consistency to soup.
13)Transfer the blended puree back to the pan.also add in cream for extra creaminess. 
14)Replace cream with milk if you are diet conscious.
15)Mix well and simmer for a minute. do not boil, as cream might curdle.
16)Stir well making sure the soup has turned to creamy consistency.
17)Finally, serve cream of mushroom soup piping hot topped with extra cream and pepper.

name: Broccoli Soup
ingredients: 8 oz (227g) Broccoli,3.5 oz (100g) Swiss Processed Cheese (5 Slices),1/2 Cup Half & Half Milk,1 Russet Potato,1 Onion,1 Garlic Clove,2 Tbsp Unsalted Butter,Salt, Black Pepper Powder
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Dice the onion.
2)Slice the Broccoli.
3)Dice the Potato.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Fry the onions with unsalted butter until golden.
2)Mash in a garlic clove.
3)Stir in broccoli. Over medium heat, fry the broccolis for 5 minutes.
4)Stir in diced potatoes.
5)Pour in enough water to cover the ingredients.
6)Cover the pot. Over medium-low heat, boil for 25 minutes.
7)Add as much as salt and pepper as you'd prefer.
8)Stir in swiss cheese. Keep stirring until the cheese is completely melted in the soup.
9)Add half and half milk. Stir well.
10)Over medium-low heat, simmer the soup for 20 minutes or until the soup thickens.

name: Cabbage Soup
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,1 inch ginger (finely chopped),2 clove garlic (finely chopped),4 tbsp spring onion (chopped),2 cup cabbage (roughly chopped),1 carrot (shredded),2 capsicum (sliced),4 cup water,1 tsp salt,1 tbsp vinegar,1 tsp pepper powder,2 tbsp mint (chopped),2 tbsp coriander (chopped),for slurry:1 tbsp cornflour,1 cup water
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a kadai heat 2 tbsp olive oil and saute 1 inch ginger, 2 clove garlic and 2 tbsp spring onion.add 2 cup cabbage, 1 carrot and 1  capsicum.
2)Stir fry for 2 minutes on high flame until it shrinks slightly.
3)Further, add 4 cup water, 1 tsp salt and mix well.
4)Stir and boil for 2 minutes.Further, in a small bowl take 1 tbsp cornflour and 1  cup water.
5)Mix well making sure there are no lumps.
6)Pour the cornflour slurry and boil for 2 minutes or until soup thickens.
7)Now add 1 tbsp vinegar and 1  tsp pepper powder. 
8)Mix well.also, add 2 tbsp spring onion, 2 tbsp mint and 2 tbsp coriander.
9)Finally, enjoy cabbage soup recipe garnished with more spring onion.

name: Cauliflower Salad
ingredients: 1 Small Cauliflower (22 oz - 623 g),1 Garlic Clove,Salt, Black Pepper Powder, Dried Mint,2 Fresh Limes,2 Tbsp Olive Oil
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Chop the cauliflower.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Transfer cauliflower to a container.
2)Mash a garlic clove on top.
3)Sprinkle salt and pepper as much as preferred.
4)Add dried crushed mint (approx. 1 tbsp).
5)Squeeze two to three fresh lime on top.
6)add olive oil and stir well until olive oil is thoroughly spread.
7)Cover the container with a lid or plastic wrap.
8)Keep the cauliflower in a refrigerator to marinate over night or at least 6 hours.

name: Beans Salad
ingredients: 1 lb (453 g) Green Beans,1 Onion,3 Tomatoes,1/2 Bell Pepper,1 Garlic Clove4 Tbsp Olive Oil,Salt, Black Pepper Powder,1/3 Cup Water
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Slice the onion, tomatoes, bell pepper and green beans.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Pour olive oil into a frying pan.
2)Add onions and fry until translucent.
3)Add sliced tomatoes and bell pepper to the pan and continue frying for 5 more minutes.
4)Add green beans to the pan.
5)Mash a garlic clove on top.
6)Add a pinch of salt and black pepper as preferred, stir well.
7)Add 1/3 cup of water (boiled water) to the pan.
8)Cover the pan with a lid, simmer for 35 to 40 minutes.
9)Keep in refrigerator before serving.

name: Broccoli Salad
ingredients: 5 oz (142g) Broccoli,1 Red Onion,5 oz (142g) Coleslaw,1/4 Cup Sunflower Seeds,4 oz (113g) Turkey Bacon,1 Cup Onion Salad Dressing
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Dice the onion.
2)Cut the broccoli in smaller size.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Preheat oven to 350 degree F (177 degree C), bake the turkey bacon for 15 minutes.
2)Remove the bacons from oven and place on a napkin to suck the excessive oil out.
3)Set the turkey bacons aside to cool down.
4)Cut/crumble the turkey bacons as preferred.
5)Combine turkey bacons, broccoli, red onions, coleslaw, and sunflower seeds in a large bowl.6.Add a cup of onion salad dressing and stir thoroughly until all the ingredients are mixed.

name: Cabbage Salad
ingredients: 2 lbs (907g) Russet Potatoes,12 oz (340g) Cabbage,2 oz (57g) Cilantro,1 oz (28g) Green Onions1 oz (28g) Dill,3 Tbsp Plain Yogurt,3 Tbsp Sour Cream,3 Tbsp Mayonnaise,3 Pearl Onions,White Pepper Powder,Salt
recipe:
Preparations:
1)Peel the potatoes.
2)Mince the cilantro, green onions, cabbage, dill and pearl onions.
Directions:
1)Transfer the potatoes onto a pot. Add salt and enough water to cover the potatoes.
2)Cover the pot and over medium heat boil for about 20 minutes.
3)Allow the potatoes to cool down and dice.
4)Combine all the potatoes with minced cilantro, green onions, cabbage, dill and pearl onions in a large bowl.
5)Garnish with salt and white pepper powder.
6)Add mayonnaise, sour cream, and plain yogurt and stir well.

name: Cucumber Salad
ingredients: 1 Cucumber,1/4 Bunch Cilantro (0.5 oz / 14g),2 Tbsp Rice Vinegar,1 Tbsp Olive Oil,1/2 Tsp Ground Coriander Seed,Salt, Sugar, Crushed Chili Pepper
recipe:
Preparations:
1)Slice the cucumber.
2)Grind the coriander seeds.
3)Mince the cilantro.
Directions:
1)Combine rice vinegar, olive oil, salt, sugar, crushed chili pepper, coriander seed.
2)Stir the sauce thoroughly until all the ingredients are well mixed.
3)Transfer the sliced cucumbers to a large bowl.
4)Stir in minced cilantro.
5)Pour the sauce on top and stir thoroughly.Serve the salad cold.

name: Cake Pops
ingredients: Red Velvet Cake or Chocolate Cake or Sponge Cake (Approx. 1 lb / 454g),Buttercream Frosting,White Melting Chocolate (Approx. 4 oz / 113g),Dark Melting Chocolate (Approx. 4 oz / 113g),Edible Cake Glitter / Sprinkles,Lollipop Sticks
recipe:
1)Crumble the cake.
2)Transfer the crumbled cake to a large bowl.
3)Gradually add buttercream frosting until the cake sticks together.
4)Make one scope sized ball shapes out of the batter.
5)Melt the chocolate in a microwave.
6)Dip the lollipop sticks in the melted chocolate and stick into the cake balls.
7)Set the cake pops aside for 10 minutes until the chocolates cool down and glue the sticks to the cake.Re-melt the chocolates before the next step.
8)Dip the cake pops in the melted chocolate and before the chocolate cools down, sprinkle the surface with edible cake glitter or sprinkles of your choice.
9)Before serving, allow the cake pops to cool down thoroughly. (Refrigerate if needed).

name: Sponge Cake
ingredients: 1/2 Cup All Purpose Flour,2 Eggs,1/2 Cup Sugar,1 Tsp Lemon Juice,1/4 Tsp Cream Of Tartar,1 Tsp Vegetable Oil
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Separate the egg yolks and whites.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Beat the egg yolks until pale and creamy.
2)While whisking, stir in sugar, lemon juice and 2 Tbsp cold Water.
3)Whisk in flour gradually.
4)In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until soft peak.
5)Mix in cream of tartar.
6)Add the egg white to the egg yolk mixture and stir using a spoon or spatula. (Shown in the video).
7)Grease a bakeware with vegetable oil, transfer the batter to the bakeware.
8)Preheat oven to 325 degree F (163 degree C), bake the sponge cake for an hour.
9)Cut the cake in half and fill it with any filling you would like.

name: Apple Cake
ingredients: 1 Cup All-Purpose Flour,1 Egg,1 Medium Apple,5 1/2 Tbsp Unsalted Butter,1/4 Cup Sugar,1/3 Cup Brown Sugar,1/4 Tsp Vanilla Sugar,1 Tsp Baking Powder,1/2 Cup Milk,1 Tsp Ground Cinnamon,Vegetable Oil
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Peel the apple, cut it in 1/8 inch slices.
2)Leave the butter in room temperature 20 minutes to soften.
DIRECTIONS:
1)In a large bowl, beat the egg until stiff.
2)Add the softened unsalted butter and continue blending until well combined.
3)Combine the flour, vanilla extract and baking powder, mix well.
4)Pour the flour mixture into the egg and butter bowl.
5)Gradually add the milk to the bowl and continue stirring until well mixed.
6)Brush/grease a 2 inch nonstick bakeware with vegetable oil.
7)Add half of the batter into the bakeware evenly.
8)Arrange the sliced apples across the batter.
9)Combine the brown sugar and cinnamon in a cup.
10)Sprinkle half of the brown sugar mixture on top the apples.
11)Add the rest of the batter on top of the brown sugar mixture to cover it completely.
12)Add the rest of the brown sugar mixture on top.
13)Preheat the oven to 375 degree F (190 degree C).
14)Bake the cake for 30 minutes or until golden.

name: Cake Roll
ingredients: 1/2 Cup All Purpose Flour,3/4 Cup Heavy Whipping Cream,4 Eggs,1/2 Cup (Approx. 3.5 oz / 100g) Sugar,1/2 Cup Powdered Sugar,2 oz (57g) Almonds,1/4 Cup Caramel,1/3 Tsp Baking Powder,1/4 Tsp Vanilla Extract,1/2 Tsp Vanilla Extract
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Slice the almonds.
2)Separate egg yolks and whites.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Whisk egg yolks until stiff.
2)Add 1/4 cup of sugar and continue whisking.
3)Pour 1/4 tsp of vanilla extract and a tablespoon boiling water in and stir well.
4)Combine flour and baking powder and add to the eggs gradually (add more flour if needed).
5)In a separate bowl, Whisk egg whites until fluffy.
6)Add 1/4 cup of sugar, and continue whisking until well mixed.
7)Add the white egg mixture to the egg yolk and continue whisking until well combined.
8)Grease a cookie pan with vegetable oil.
9)Cover with parchment paper (use enough paper to cover all the edges).
10)Transfer the batter to the cookie pan.
11)Preheat oven to 350 degree F (177 degree C), bake for about 15 minutes.
12)Remove the cake from oven, before it's cooled off, lay another parchment paper on top, flip to separate the pan and remove.
Warning:It will be hot, use glove.
13)Roll the cake and wrap with a dish cloth.
14)Rest the cake for 10 or so minutes to cool down on its own and shape.
FILLING:
15)In a large bowl, combine heavy whipping cream, powdered sugar, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, and whisk thoroughly.
16)Gently, re flatten the cake on a flat working surface.
17)Spread the filling across the cake (as much as you'd prefer).
18)Partially, cover the filling with a layer of almonds.
19)Top with caramel (approx. 4 tbsp).
20)Roll the cake back into the roulette shape gently.
21)Design with the remaining filling, almonds and some caramel.
22)Refrigerate for at least 20 minutes before serving.

name: Carrot Cake
ingredients: 2/3 Cup Sugar,1/3 Cup Milk,1 Cup All Purpose Flour,4 oz (113g) Carrots,2 Eggs,1/3 Cup Unsalted Butter,1/3 Tsp Baking Soda,1/4 Tsp Vanilla Extract
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Grate the carrots.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Whisk eggs until stiff. 
2)Mix in sugar and milk while whisking.
3)Stir in vanilla extract.
4)Melt unsalted butter and allow to cool down before adding to the mixture.
5)Whisk in the melted butter.
6)Stir in the grated carrots.
7)In a separate container, combine flour and baking soda.
8)Add the flour to the mixture gradually while whisking.
9)Grease a loaf pan with melted butter and transfer the batter to the pan.
10)Preheat oven to 350 degree F (177 degree C), bake the cake for an hour.

name: Cauliflower Soup
ingredients: 12 oz (340g) Cauliflower,1 Carrot,2 Stalks celery,6 Red Pearl Onions,2 Cups Milk,6 oz (170g) Shredded Cheddar Cheese,14 fl oz (414ml) Chicken Broth,3 Tbsp All-purpose Flour,3 Tbsp Unsalted Butter,2 Tbsp Unsalted Butter,Salt, White pepper powder
recipe:
Preparations:
1)Slice the cauliflower, carrot, celery and pearl onions.
Directions:
1)Fry the onions with butter (3 tbsp) until translucent.
2)Stir in sliced cauliflower, carrot, and celery.
3)Over medium heat, cover the pod and fry for 5 to 7 minutes.
4)Stir in chicken broth and continue simmering for 10 to 15 minutes.
Meanwhile prepare the sauce:
5)Melt the butter (2 Tbsp) in a saucepan.
6)Add the flour and continue stirring until well mixed. (About a minute).
7)Stir in salt and pepper.
8)Add milk and bring the mixture to a boil.
9)Add in the shredded cheddar cheese and continue stirring until well mixed.
10)Add the sauce to the soup and connote simmering for another 10 minutes.

name: Cauliflower Curry
ingredients: 12 oz (340g) Cauliflower,3.4 oz (100g) Quinoa ,3.4 oz (100g) Lentils ,1 oz (28g) Cilantro,1 oz (28g) Green onions,1 Red Bell Pepper,6 Red pearl onions,White wine vinegar or Lemon juice,1 Garlic Clove,Curry Seasoning,Salt,Black pepper powder
recipe:
Preparations:
1)Slice the cauliflower, pearl onions, and bell pepper.
2)Mince the cilantro and green onions.
Directions:
1)Add a cup of water to quinoa in a pot and boil for 15 minutes over medium heat.
2)Combine lentils with a cup of water in a pot and boil for 15 minutes over medium heat.
3)Garnish cauliflower with olive oil, curry seasoning, salt and pepper, and stir thoroughly.
4)Preheat oven to 350 degree F (190 degree C), cook the cauliflowers for 25 minutes.
5)In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, lentils, cauliflowers, green onions, bell pepper, and pearl onion.
6)Mash a fresh garlic clove on top and garnish with salt.
7)Stir in white wine vinegar or lemon juice.
8)Add olive oil and stir thoroughly.

name: Spinach Omelette
ingredients: 2 Bunches Spinach,1 Large Egg,1 Small Onion,2 Garlic Cloves,Salt, Turmeric, Curry Powder, Black Pepper Powder,2 Tbsp vegetable Oil
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Dice the onion.
2)Mince the Spinach.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Fry the diced onions in a frying pan with 2 tbsp vegetable oil until translucent.
2)Mash 2 garlic cloves into the pan, stir and continue frying.
3)Cook the minced spinach (in a microwave).
4)Allow the spinach to cool down for few minutes.
5)Squeeze the liquid out of the spinach.
6)Add the spinach to the pan, and stir.
7)Add salt, black pepper powder, curry powder and turmeric to the pan and stir thoroughly until well mixed.
8)Crack a large egg into the pan and start stirring immediately.
9)Continue frying for two more minutes.

name: Spinach Soup
ingredients: 3 oz (85g) Spinach,1/2 Cup Oatmeal,1 1/4 Cup Chicken Broth (10 fl oz),1/4 Cup Half & Half Milk,1 Onion,1 Garlic Clove,2 Tbsp Vegetable Oil,Turmeric, Salt, Ground Chili Pepper
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Dice the onions.
2)Mince the spinach.
3)Heat the spinach in a microwave for 4 minutes.
DIRECTIONS:
1)Fry the diced onions until golden (vegetable oil).
2)Mash in a garlic clove. Stir and continue frying for 2 more minutes.
3)Stir in the spinach.
4)Add turmeric, salt, ground chili pepper.
5)Stir in oatmeal, stir and continue frying for couple of more minutes.
6)Pour in chicken broth, and stir thoroughly.
7)Cover the pot with a lid and simmer for 5 to 7 minutes.
8)Stir in half & half milk.

name: Spinach Chaat
ingredients: For chaat:cup curd / yogurt (whisk),4 tsp tamarind chutney,4 tsp green chutney,1 tsp chaat masala,1 tsp cumin powder / jeera powder.1 tsp aamchur / dry mango powder,1 tsp chilli powder,1  onion (finely chopped),1 cup sev (fine), tomato (finely chopped),pinch salt 2 tbsp,coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, prepare besan batter adding spices.mix to smooth and lump free thick batter.
2)Dip the palak leaf into prepared besan batter and coat it completely.
3)Furthermore, deep fry in hot oil.also stir occasionally and fry on both sides until it turns golden and crisp.
4)Drain off the palak pakoda to remove off excess oil.arrange palak pakora on the plate.
5)Pour 1 tbsp curd, 1 tsp tamarind chutney and 1 tsp green chutney.
6)Also sprinkle a pinch of chaat masala, cumin powder, aamchur and chilli powder.
7)Furthermore, top with 3 tbsp sev.additionally, add 2 tbsp onion and 2 tbsp tomato.again top with 1 tbsp curd, 1 tsp tamarind chutney and 1 tsp green chutney.
8)Finally, palak chaat or spinach chaat is ready to serve.

name: Spinach Naan
ingredients: For palak puree:1 bunch palak leaves / spinach,3 cups water,1 inch ginger,1 green chilli,for dough:2 cup wheat flour,1 tsp ajwain / carom seeds,salt to taste,2 tsp oil,water as required (to knead dough),Other ingredients:cup wheat flour (to dust),oil / ghee / for roasting
recipe:
1)Firstly, prepare a dough with palak puree.
2)Further pinch a medium sized ball dough, roll and flatten it.
3)Also dust with some wheat flour.and roll it in a thin circle like chapathi or paratha.
4)Now on a hot tawa place the rolled paratha and cook for a minute.
5)Furthermore, when the base is partly cooked, flip and cook.also brush oil / ghee and press slightly.
6)Finally, serve palak paratha with raita and pickle.

name: Spinach Dal
ingredients: 1 bunch spinach leaves (finely chopped),1 cup of toor dal,2-3 curry leaves,1 chilli (chopped),1 small lemon sized tamarind,1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp oil,salt as per taste,4 cups of water,for seasoning,2 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds,1 tsp jeera seeds,2 red chillies (dried),few curry leaves,4-5 chopped garlic pods (chopped),pinch of hing
recipe:
1)Clean wash the spinach or palak leaves and finely chop them.in a pressure cooker, add 1 cup of toor dal and 3 cups of water.
2)Now add 1 bowl of finely chopped palak leaves to pressure cooker.
3)Add tamarind, curry leaves, green chilli and 1 tsp of oil and mix well. 
4)Make sure all the palak leaves are properly dipped in the water.
5)Add a cup of water if required.close the lid of pressure cooker and cook it for 5 whistles.
6)Once the pressure from cooker releases, open the lid and smash the dal well. 
7)Simmer it in low flame.now add turmeric, chilli powder and salt. 
8)Mix it properly and keep it aside.
9)In a frying pan take some oil and add all the seasoning ingredients mentioned in the recipe card.
10)Once the garlic turns golden brown, mix the seasoning ingredients to palak dal. 
11)Give a good stir to palak dal.your palak dal is ready. 
12)Serve with hot steamed rice or with rotis.

name: Peas Chaat
ingredients: For pressure cooking:1 cup white peas,water (for soaking),1 potato (peel & chop),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp clove,3 cup water (for pressure cooking),for masala paste:2 tbsp oil,1 tsp fennel / saunf,1 onion (sliced),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 tomato (chopped),1 cup mint / pudina,1 cup coriander,For curry:2 tbsp oil,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 bay leaf,1 inch cinnamon1  tsp chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp cumin powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 cup water,1 tsp salt,For serving (1 serve):4 puri,1 tsp tamarind chutney,1 tsp green chutney2 tbsp spicy sev,2 tbsp tomato (finely chopped),2 tbsp onion (finely chopped),1 tsp coriander (finely chopped),pinch chaat masala
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 1 cup white peas and soak in enough water for 8 hours.
2)Take soaked peas in the cooker and add 1 potato, 1  tsp turmeric and 1  tsp clove.
3)Add 3 cup water and pressure cook for 6 whistles.
4)Mash the potato slightly, adjusting the consistency as required. keep aside.
5)Now repare masala paste by heating, 2 tbsp oil and saute 1 tsp fennel.
6)Also add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute slightly.
7)Further, add 1 tomato and saute until the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.cool completely and transfer to a blender.
8)Add 1  cup mint and ? cup coriander.blend to smooth paste adding water if required. keep aside.
9)In a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and ? tsp cumin, 1 bay leaf and 1 inch cinnamon. 
10)Saute until spices turn aromatic.now add 1  tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp coriander powder, 1  tsp cumin powder and 1  tsp garam masala.
11)Saute on low flame until spices turn aromatic.
12)Further, add in boiled white peas and mix well.
13)Add 1 cup water and 1 tsp salt.mix well adjusting consistency as required.
14)Cover and simmer or 10 minutes, or until the flavours are well absorbed.
15)Masala puri curry is ready to enjoy.

name: Dahi Chaat
ingredients: 13 papdi,3 tbsp potato / aloo (boiled & chopped),3 tbsp chickpea (boiled),3 tbsp onion (finely chopped),5 tbsp curd (whisked),3 tsp green chutney,3 tsp tamarind chutney,pinch chilli powder,pinch cumin powder,pinch chaat masala,pinch salt,1 tbsp tomato (finely chopped),3 tbsp sev,1 tsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a serving plate take 13 papdi. 
2)To prepare homemade papdi using wheat flour check out my papdi recipe.
3)Top with 3 tbsp potato and 3 tbsp chickpea.
4)Also, sprinkle 2 tbsp of chopped onions.
5)Now take 3 tbsp of whisked curd and drizzle over it.
6)Further, add 2 tsp of green chutney and 2 tsp of tamarind chutney.
7)Sprinkle chilli powder, cumin powder, chaat masala and salt.additionally, add 1 tbsp onion and 1 tbsp tomato.
8)Now add 1 tbsp of more curd, 1 tsp green chutney and 1 tsp tamarind chutney.
9)Top with 3 tbsp sev and garnish with 1 tsp coriander.
10)Finally, enjoy dahi papdi chaat with a hot cup of tea.

name: Aloo Chaat
ingredients: Aloo chana preparation:1 cup black chana / kala chana,water for soaking,1  tsp turmeric,1 tsp salt,2 cup water (for pressure cooking),10 small potato,Other ingredients:1 cup cumin / jeera,1 cup tamarind chutney,1 cup water,pinch kala namak,1 onion (finely chopped),2 tbsp sev,chilli powder
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl soak 1  cup black chana in enough water for 6 hours.
2)Drain off the water and transfer to the cooker.add 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp salt and 2 cup water.
3)Place a steam basket and put 10 small potatoes.cover and pressure cook for 5 whistles.
4)Aloo and chana is ready.now prepare jeera powder by taking 1  cup cumin in large pan.
5)Dry roast on low flame until the cumin turns blackish with smoky aroma.
6)Transfer to a mortar pestle and crush to a fine powder. 
7)Jeera powder is ready.now take 1 cup tamarind chutney and dilute with 1 cup water.
8)Mix well and tamarind water is ready.to prepare aloo cup, take boiled potato and peel the skin.
9)Cut the potato and make a hole in the centre. you can use leftover aloo to prepare aloo masala or sandwich.
10)To serve, in a plate arrange aloo cups

name: SevPuri Chaat
ingredients: 1 cup white peas / vatana / safed matar,1 potato (peel & chop),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp salt,3 cup water,3 tsp oil,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 chilli (finely chopped),1 to mato (finely chopped),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp cumin powder / jeera powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp salt,2 tsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a pressure cooker take 1 cup soaked white peas (vatana), 1 potato, 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp salt and 3 cup water.
2)Pressure cook for 5 whistles or until white peas get cooked completely.
3)Now in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 chilli.
4)Also, saute 1 tomato until it turns soft and mushy.
5)Saute until the oil is released from the sides.now add boiled peas and mix well.
7)Boil for 5 minutes or until the spices is absorbed well.
8)Mash the peas and potato slightly, to thicken the consistency.
9)Also, add coriander leaves and mix well. 
10)Ragda is ready.

name: Kichidi Dal
ingredients: 1 cup rice,1 cup moong dal,1 tsp ghee,1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp salt,3 cup water,other ingredients:2 tbsp ghee,1 tsp cumin,1 bay leaf,pinch hing,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 tomato (finely chopped),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp salt
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl rinse and soak 1  cup rice, 1  cup moong dal for 10 minutes.
2)In a cooker heat 1 tsp ghee and add soaked dal and rice.
3)Saute for 2 minutes, or until the dal turns aromatic.now add 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp salt and 31  cup water. 
4)Mix well.cover and pressure cook for 5 minutes.in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp ghee. 
5)Add 1 tsp cumin, 1 bay leaf and pinch hing.saute on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.
6)Now add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute well.
7)Further, add 1 tomato and saute until the tomato turns soft and mushy.
8)Keeping the flame on low add 1  tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp garam masala and 1  tsp salt.
9)Saute for 2 minutes or until the spices turn aromatic.
10)Now add cooked rice and dal.

name: Moong Dal
ingredients: 1 cup moong dal,water (for soaking),1 cup ghee / clarified butter,1 tbsp rava / semolina / suji,2 cup milk,1 cup sugar,5 cashew (chopped),5 almond (chopped),1 tsp cardamom powder
recipe:
1)Firstly, rinse the moong dal and soak for 2 hours.
2)Drain off the water and transfer to a blender.
3)Blend to a slightly coarse paste adding water if required. keep aside.
4)In a large kadai heat 1  cup ghee and add 1 tbsp rava.roast on low flame until the rava turns aromatic. 
5)Adding rava helps to give good texture to halwa.
6)Now add in prepared moong dal paste and mix well.
7)Keeping the flame on medium, mix until the moong dal absorbs the ghee.
8)Continue to cook breaking the lumps.cook until the mixture turns crumble and grainy texture.
9)After 20 minutes, the mixture turns crisp.now add 2 cup milk, few saffron. 
10)You can alternatively use water or milk and water combination.
11)Stir continuously, until the mixture absorbs all the milk.
12)The mixture will start to hold shape leaving the kadai.
13)Now add 1 cup sugar and mix well.
14)The sugar starts to melt and turns the mixture watery.

name: Panchmel Dal
ingredients: 2 tbsp ghee,1 bay leaf,4 cloves,1 black cardamom,1 tsp cumin,1 dried red chilli,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp cumin powder,1 tsp salt,2 tomato (finely chopped),1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp kasuri methi (crushed),2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a bowl take 1  cup toor dal, 1  cup urad dal, 1  cup moong dal, 1  cup masoor dal and 1  cup chana dal.
2)Rinse well and soak for 30 minutes.
3)Transfer the soaked dal into the pressure cooker.
4)Add 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp salt, 2 bay leaf, 1 tsp ghee and 3 cups water.
5)Pressure cook for 5 whistles or until the dal is cooked completely.
6)Once the pressure releases, open the cooker and check if the dal is cooked well. keep aside.
7)In a large kadai heat 2 tbsp ghee. add 1 bay leaf, 4 cloves, 1 black cardamom, 1 tsp cumin and 1 dried red chilli.saute on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.
8)Now add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute until onions turn golden brown.
9)Further add 1  tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1  tsp cumin powder and 1  tsp salt.

name: Dal Soup
ingredients: 3 tbsp masoor dal,3 tbsp moong dal,2 tbsp toor dal,1 inch ginger,2 clove garlic,1 tomato (chopped),1 carrot (chopped),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp salt,2 cup water,1 tsp pepper powder,1 cup water (adjust consistency),2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a bowl take 3 tbsp masoor dal, 3 tbsp moong dal and 2 tbsp toor dal.
2)Rinse well and soak for 30 minutes.now transfer the soaked dal to a pressure cooker.
3)Add 1 inch ginger, 2 clove garlic, 1  tsp turmeric, 1  tsp salt and 2 cup water.
4)Cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium flame.
5)Once the pressure releases, cool completely and transfer to the blender.
6)Blend to smooth paste.take the veggie dal paste to a large kadai.
7)Add 1  tsp pepper powder and 11  cup water. 
8)Adjusting consistency as required.
9)Mix well and simmer for 5 minutes or until the flavours are well absorbed.
10)Finally, add 2 tbsp coriander and dal soup is ready to serve.

name: Kaala Dal
ingredients: 2 tbsp ghee / clarified butter,1 bay leaf,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp kasuri methi,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 chilli (slit),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,2 tsp coriander powder, tsp cumin powder,1 tsp garam masala
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take  cup black urad dal and soak in enough water for 3 hours.
2)Drain off the water and transfer to a pressure cooker.
3)Add 3 cup water and 1 tsp ghee.cover and pressure cook for 5 whistles or until dal is cooked well.
4)Keep aside.in a large kadai, heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp cumin and 1 tsp kasuri methi.
5)Add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 chilli.
6)Saute well making sure onions turn golden brown,keeping the flame on low, add 1 tsp turmeric, 2 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp garam masala and 1 tsp salt.
7)Saute on low flame, until spices turn aromatic.
8)Further, add 2 tomato and saute until tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
9)Add in pressure cooked dal and mix well.

name: Bread Sticks
ingredients: 1 1/2 Cup All-Purpose Flour,1 1/4 Tsp Yeast,1 Tbsp honey,3 Tbsp Olive oil,1 Tsp Basil,1/2 Tsp Salt,1 Tbsp Parmesan Cheese,1 Garlic Clove
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Heat 2/3 cup of water to 105 to 115 degree F (40 to 46 degree C).
DIRECTIONS:
1)Combine the yeast and honey with 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a bowl.
2-)Add the 2/3 cup of heated water (105 degree to 115 degree F/ 40 degree to 46 degree C), mix well.
3) Let the mixture sit for about 10 minutes at room temperature.
4) Add 1 tbsp crushed dried basil and 1/2 tsp of salt to the bowl.
5) Add the flour to the bowl, add more flour if the dough is too sticky, knead for 10 minutes.
6) Divide the dough in 8 small balls.
7) Roll each ball to make an approximate one inch bar and place them in a well floured bakeware.
8) cover the bakeware with a cloth and let the dough rise until double (about 40 minutes)
9) In a small bowl, mix 1 to 2 tbsp of olive oil, parmesan cheese and a mashed garlic clove, stirring.
10) Brush each dough stick with the olive/garlic mixture.
11) Preheat oven to 350 degree F (177 degree C), bake the breadstick 18 to 22 minutes.

name: Taftoon Bread
ingredients: 1 2/3 Cup All Purpose Flour,1/2 Tsp Yeast,1 Tsp Sugar,1/4 Tsp Salt (as you prefer),1 Tbsp Vegetable Oil,Nigella Seeds, Sesame Seeds
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:
1)Heat a cup of water to 105 degree - 115 degree F (40 degree - 46 degree C).
DIRECTIONS:
1) Pour the hot water into a large bowl.
2) Add yeast, Sugar, salt and vegetable oil and stir thoroughly.
3) Add the flour gradually as you stir and knead. Add more flour if needed.
4) Knead for 7 to 10 minutes on a floured working surface.
5) Place the dough back into the bowl, cover with a lid or plastic wrap.
6) Allow the dough to rise for 40 minutes.
7) Preheat a griddle over medium to high heat.
8) Take a fist full of the dough and roll out on a floured surface using a rolling pin.
9) Place the bread over the griddle and sprinkle with nigella seeds and sesame seeds.
10) Flip the bread.

name: Garlic Bread
ingredients: 1 cup butter (softened),6 clove garlic (grated),2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped),1 tsp mixed herbs,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp white pepper powder,1 tsp salt,4 slice bread (white or brown)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a small bowl take 1  cup butter and 6 clove garlic.add 2 tbsp coriander, 1 tsp mixed herbs, 1 tsp chilli flakes 1  tsp white pepper powder and 1  tsp salt.
2)Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
3)Now cut the sides of bread. i have cut only 2 sides of the bread.
4)Then cut into thick strips.
5)Spread the garlic butter on the bread stirps.toast the breadsticks on pan. 
6)You can alternatively bake in oven or grill.
7)Turn over and toast until the bread turns golden brown.
8)Finally, enjoy chilli garlic breadsticks with more chilli flakes.

name: Bread Kulfi
ingredients: 3 slice bread (white/ brown),1 litre milk,1 tsp saffron / kesar,1 cup sugar,4 anjeer (chopped),2 tbsp almonds (chopped),2 tbsp pistachios (chopped),1 tsp cardamom powder
recipe:
1)Firstly, trim the sides of the bread and cut into pieces.
2)In mixi, using pulse mode powder into breadcrumbs. 
3)Keep aside.in a large kadai take 1 litre of milk and 1  tsp saffron.
4)Stir and get the milk to a boil.once the milk comes to a boil add 1  cup sugar and 4 anjeer.
5)Stir and boil making sure the sugar dissolves completely.
6)Further, add prepared breadcrumbs and mix well.
7)Continue to boil until the milk thickens. 
8)Bread helps to thicken the milk and give a grainy texture like in malai kulfi.
9)Now add 2 tbsp almonds, 2 tbsp pistachios and 1  tsp cardamom powder.
10)Mix well, pour the kulfi mixture into kulfi moulds. 
11)If you do not have moulds, you can pour until matka or glass cups.
12)Cover and freeze for 8 hours or until sets completely.
13)After 8 hours, the kulfi has set completely and is ready to serve.
14)Finally, garnish the bread kulfi with a few chopped almonds and enjoy.

name: Bread Pudding
ingredients: For sugar caramel:1 cup sugar,for custard mixture:3 slice bread (white or brown),2 cup milk,1 cup sugar,1 cup custard powder (vanilla flavoured)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a pan take 1  cup sugar and heat on low to medium flame.
2)Stir in between until sugar melts completely.
3)Continue to heat on low to medium flame until the sugar turns golden brown. 
4)This stage of sugar is called caramelized sugar.
5)Pour the caramelized sugar into a small bowl and swirl slightly to coat the wall of the bowl. keep aside.
6)Now take 3 bread slices, and trim off the sides.pulse into crumbs using a mixi. 
7)Make sure to pulse and blend and not make a paste. keep aside.
8)In a large bowl, take 2 cup milk, 1  cup sugar and 1  cup custard powder.
9)Whisk and mix well until everything is well combined. make sure there are no lumps.
10)Transfer the milk mixture into a large kadai and cook on medium flame until the milk thickens.
11)Now add in crumbled bread and mix well.continue to cook until the mixture turns super creamy and thick.
12)Pour the mixture into the bowl of caramelised sugar.place in the steamer for 30 minutes.
13)Cool completely and refrigerate for 1 hour or until it sets completely.
14)Finally, unmould and enjoy caramel bread pudding.

name: Bread Pizza
ingredients: For pizza sauce:cup tomato sauce,1 tsp chilli sauce,1 tsp chilli flakes,1 tsp mixed herbs,Other ingredients:3 slice bread (white or brown),capsicum (sliced),tomato (sliced),onion (sliced),sweet corn,olives (sliced),jalapeno (sliced),mozzarella cheese (grated),chilli flakes,mixed herbs,butter (for toasting)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a small bowl take 1  cup tomato sauce, 1 tsp chilli sauce, 1  tsp chilli flakes and 1  tsp mixed herbs.
2)Mix well making sure everything is well combined. pizza sauce is ready. keep aside.
3)Take a bread slice and spread 2 tsp of prepared pizza sauce. 
4)You can alternatively use store brought pizza sauce.top with few capsicum, tomato, onion, sweet corn, olives and jalapeno.
5)Also spread generous amount of mozzarella cheese. you can use cheese of your choice.
6)Now sprinkle, chilli flakes and mixed herbs.place the bread slice over tawa brushed with generous amount of butter.
7)Cover and cook for 2 minutes on low to medium flame until the cheese melts.
8)Finally, enjoy bread pizza sliced into half.

name: Tandoori Naan
ingredients: 2 cup wheat flour,1 tsp sugar,1 tsp baking powder,1 tsp baking soda,1 tsp salt,1 cup curd,water (for kneading),2 tbsp oil
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 21  cup wheat flour, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, 1  tsp baking soda and 1  tsp salt.
2)Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
3)Now add 1  cup curd and start to knead the dough.
4)Add water as required and continue to knead for 5 minutes.
5)Now add 2 tbsp oil and knead until the dough turns fdmooth and soft.
6)Cover and rest for 1 hour or more.after 1 hour, kenad the dough again making sure the dough is soft.
7)Pinch a ball sized dough and dust with wheat flour.
8)Roll gently, making sure the roti is slightly thick.
9)Now sprinkle some water and spread uniformly.
10)Heat the tawa on medium flame, and once the tawa is hot transfer the roti onto the tawa.
11)Make sure the waterside is facing down. press gently, so that the roti sticks to the pan.
12)Cook for a minute or until the roti partially puffs up and the base gets cooked up.
13)Now flip the tawa onto the flame and cook until the roti is cooked uniformly.
14)Don't worry if there are some black spots appearing. 
15)It gives a tandoor effect.

name: ChurChur Naan
ingredients: For dough:2 cup maida / plain flour,1 tsp sugar,1 tsp baking powder,1 tsp baking soda,1 tsp salt,3 tbsp ghee / clarified butter,1 cup curd / yogurt,1 cup water,1 tsp oil (for greasing),For stuffing:2 potato / aloo (boiled & mashed),1 cup paneer / cottage cheese (grated),1 tsp ginger paste,2 chilli (finely chopped),1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp coriander seeds (crushed),1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp cumin powder,1 tsp aamchur,1 tsp pepper powder,2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped),1 tsp salt,Other ingredients:maida / plain flour (for dusting),ghee / clarified butter,water (for sealing),coriander (for decorating),paneer / cottage cheese (for garnishing)
recipe:
Dough preparation:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 2 cup maida, 1  tsp sugar, 1  tsp baking powder, 1  tsp baking soda and 1 tsp salt. mix well.
2)Now add 3 tbsp ghee, crumble and mix until the flour turns moist.
3)Further, add 1  cup curd and mix until it is well combined.add 1  cup water and start to knead the dough.
4)Knead for 5 minutes, to form a smooth and soft dough.tuck the dough and grease with 1 tsp oil. 
5)Rest the dough for 2 hours.
Stuffing preparation:
1)Firstly, in a bowl take 2 potato, 1 cup paneer, 1 tsp ginger paste, 2 chilli and 1 onion.
2)Also add 1 tsp coriander seeds, 1  tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp garam masala, 1  tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp aamchur, 1  tsp pepper powder, 2 tbsp coriander and 1  tsp salt.
3)Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
Chur chur naan preparation:
1)After 2 hours of resting the dough, knead the dough again.
2)Pinch a large ball sized dough and dust with maida.
3)Roll and flatten as thin as possible.
4)Now spread 2 tsp of ghee over it and sprinkle 2 tsp of maida.
5)Mix and spread uniformly.now roll into a cylindrical and further roll again into a spiral.
6)Further using a rolling pin, flatten slightly stuff a ball sized prepared stuffing and seal it.
7)Now sprinkle 2 tsp of coriander and press gently.
8)Press and flatten well making sure to form a thick disk.
9)Turn over and with the help of a rolling pin, flatten slightly without getting the stuffing out.
10)Rush with water on one side of naan (brush water on the plain side of naan). 
11)Take sure you coat uniformly. this helps naan to stick on tawa.
12)Furthermore, slowly flip over and put it on hot tawa. remember, be gentle and put the water coated side down to tawa. 
13)Also do not use nonstick tawa.slightly press. this helps the naan to stick on to the tawa and when you flip the tawa upside down it will be intact.
14)Now after a minute, flip the tawa upside down and cook naan directly on flame till they turn golden brown.
15)Gently scrape the naan from the bottom and remove.
16)If the edges are uncooked, you can directly cook over the flame.
17)Spread a generous amount of butter over naan and crush slightly to separate layers.
18)Finally, garnish with grated paneer and serve chur chur naan with chana masala.

recipe:

name: Kulcha Naan
ingredients: 2 cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour,1 tsp sugar,1 tsp baking powder,1 tsp baking soda,1 tsp salt,2 tsp oil,1 cup curd / yogurt,1 cup water (to knead dough),4 tsp black sesame seeds / til,1 cup coriander leaves (finely chopped),2 tbsp butter (to brush)
recipe:

name: Naan Berenji
ingredients: 1.5 Cup (9 oz / 255g) Rice Flour,1 Cup (4.5 oz / 127g) Confectioners (Powdered) Sugar,5.3 oz (150g) Unsalted Butter,1 Large Egg (yolk),1 Tsp Ground Cardamom,Poppy Seeds
recipe:

3) Beat the egg yolk in a separate bowl.
4) Stir in egg yolk to the mixture.

6) Take a spoon of the batter, make a 2 inch ball and place on a cookie pan covered with parchment paper.

name: Mushroom Kalan
ingredients: For mushroom pakoda:2 cup mushroom (finely chopped),1 cup cabbage (finely chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 tsp salt,1 cup maida / plain flour,1 cup cornflour,oil (for frying),For sauce:2 tbsp oil,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp chilli powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp pepper powder,1 tsp salt,2 tbsp tomato sauce,2 tbsp vinegar,2 tbsp soy sauce,2 tbsp cornflour,1 cup water,few curry leaves,2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:
1)Firstly, in a large bowl take 2 cup mushroom, 1 cup cabbage and 1  onion.add 1  tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, 1  tsp garam masala, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1  tsp salt.

12)Stir fry on high flame until the sauces are combined well.

name: Mushroom Sabji
ingredients: 4 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard,1 tsp cumin / jeera,few curry leaves,3 clove garlic (sliced),1 green chilli (slit),1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger paste,1 tomato (chopped),500 grams mushroom (slice),1 tsp salt,1  tsp turmeric,1 tsp kashmiri chilli powder,1 tsp garam masala,tsp pepper (crushed),2 tbsp coriander leaves (chopped),1 tbsp lemon juice
recipe:

name: Mushroom 65
ingredients: 1 cup besan / gram flour,1 cup rice flour, 1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder,pinch of baking soda,1  tsp chaat masala,tsp ajwain / caraway,pinch of hing / asafoetida,1 tsp ginger garlic paste,salt to taste,1 cup water
recipe:

name: Mushroom Rice
ingredients: For rice:6 cup water,1 tsp  oil,1 tsp salt,1 cup basmati rice (soaked 20 min),for mushroom fried rice:6 tsp  oil,250 grams mushroom (sliced),1 chilli (slit),3 clove garlic (finely chopped),2 onion (finely chopped),4 tbsp spring onion (chopped),2 carrot (chopped),5 beans (chopped),2 capsicum (chopped),1 tsp salt,2 tbsp soy sauce,1 tbsp vinegar,1 tsp pepper (crushed)

name: Mushroom Tikka

name: Pumpkin Mousse

8) Place pureed pumpkin in another bowl.

name: Pumpkin Kuitareh
ingredients: 1 1/2 Lb (679 g) Pumpkin,2 Tbsp Vegetable Oil,3 Garlic Cloves,Turmeric, White Pepper Powder, Salt,2 Tbsp Tomato Paste,1/3 Cup Walnuts,1 Tbsp Sugar,2 Tbsp Pomegranate Molasses,Angelica Ground (optional)
recipe:
PREPARATIONS:

DIRECTIONS:

name: Pumpkin Puree
ingredients: 1 Pumpkin
recipe:
1) Cut the pumpkin in half.
2) Remove the seeds thoroughly.
3) Place the pumpkins on a 4 inch deep bakeware.
4) Preheat oven to 375 degree F (190 degree C), cook pumpkins for 40 minutes.
5) Allow few minutes to cool down.
6) Spoon out the pumpkin's pulp into a large bowl.
7) Mash the pulp thoroughly.

name: Pumkin Sabji
ingredients: 4 tsp oil,1 bay leaf,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp methi / fenugreek,pinch hing / asafoetida,2 chilli (slit),1 tsp ginger paste,600 grams pumpkin / kaddu (cubed),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp salt,1.5 cup water,1 tsp jaggery,1 tsp aamchur / dry mango powder,2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)
recipe:

name: Pumpkin Fry
ingredients: 2 medium sized kumbalakai / ash gourd / winter melon,1 green chilli,1 tsp turmeric powder,2 cup water,1 cup grated / desiccated / shredded coconut,few coriander leaves (chopped),salt to taste,For tempering:3-4 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard seeds,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp channa dal,1 tsp cumin seeds,2 dried red chillies,a pinch of asafoetida / hing,few curry leaves

name: Beans Stew
ingredients: 1 lb (453 g) Green Beans,1 lb (453 g) Stew Beef,1 Small Onion,2 Tbsp Vegetable Oil,2 Small Potatoes,1 Tbsp Tomato Paste,Turmeric, Salt, Ground Chili Pepper,Persian spice mix (Advieh)
recipe:

1) Dice the onion.

5) Boil 4-5 Cups Water.
DIRECTIONS:
1) Fry the onions in a small pot with 2 tbsp vegetable oil until translucent .
2) Add the Chopped Stew beef to the pot, stir and continue frying until the beef becomes brown.
3) Add Persian spice mix or/and Turmeric and ground chili pepper, stir and continue frying for few more minutes.
4) Pour in enough boiling water to cover the mixture by 2 inches (Approx. 1.5 cup Boiling water).
5) Cover the pot with the lid and simmer for 75 minutes.
6) Add 1 tbsp tomato paste and stir.
7) Add the green beans to the pot and stir.
8) Cover the pot with a lid and simmer for 20 minutes.

name: Beans Sabji
ingredients: 2 tbsp oil,1 tsp cumin / jeera,1 tsp kasuri methi,1 onion (finely chopped),1 tsp ginger garlic paste,400 grams beans (chopped),0.5 tsp turmeric,1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder,1 tsp coriander powder,1 tsp garam masala,1 tsp aamchur,1 tsp salt,1 tomato (roughly chopped),2 tbsp coriander (finely chopped)

name: Beans Puloa

name: Carrot Beans
ingredients: 4 tsp oil,1 tsp mustard,1 tsp urad dal,1 tsp chana dal,few curry leaves,2 dried red chilli,2 onion (finely chopped),2 chilli (slit),2 cup carrot (chopped),2 cup beans (chopped),1 tsp turmeric,1 tsp salt,cup water,1 cup coconut (grated)

name: TuttiFrutti Cookies
ingredients: 75 gram butter (room temperature),1 cup (60 gram) powdered sugar,1 cup (165 gram) maida / plain flour,1 cup (38 gram) custard powder (vanilla flavoured),pinch salt,1 tsp baking powder,pinch baking soda,3 tbsp (30 gram) red tutti frutti,3 tbsp (30 gram) green tutti frutti,2 tbsp (20 gram) cashew (chopped),1 tsp pineapple extract,2 tbsp milk

name: Cumin Cookies

name: Coconut Cookies
ingredients: For cookie:cup 110 grams butter, softened, cup 110 grams sugar,1 cup 160 grams wheat flour / atta,1 tsp baking powder,1 tsp baking soda,1 tsp salt,1 cup desiccated coconut,3 tbsp milk,1 tsp vanilla extract,For baking in cooker:1 cup salt / sand
recipe:

name: Oat Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup (110 gm) butter ( softened),1 cup (60 gm) brown sugar,1 (100 gm) banana (sliced),1.5 cup (170 gm) rolled oats,1 cup (110 gm) maida / plain flour,1 tsp baking soda,1 tsp cinnamon powder,1 tsp salt,1 tsp vanilla extract,1 cup (80 gm) raisins / kishmish,2 cup (50gm) choc bits

name: Butter Cookies
ingredients: 225 grams butter (unsalted),1 cup (75 grams) powdered sugar / icing sugar,1 cup (250 grams) maida / plain flour / all purpose flour,pinch salt
recipe:

name: Garlic Prawns
ingredients: 1 tbsp,Oil,1 cup Salted butter,25 medium sized raw Prawns, peeled with tail on,cup Garlic cloves, crushed,cup Green garlic, chopped,Salt, as required,Freshly ground black pepper, as required,Chilli flakes, as required,cup parsley, chopped,2 tbsp,Lemon juice,1 tsp,Corn starch,2-3 tbsp,Water
recipe:
